Summary Heading: Great staff and clean rooms‚Ä¶‚Ä¶..parking was easy and it‚Äôs a quick Uber ride to Disney or another venue.  Great location.
Summary: Great staff, good breakfast, and clean rooms.  A little noisy from the traffic but it‚Äôs a great location to Disney, baseball, or the Honda Center.  I enjoyed my stay for the value.  Its a quick Uber ride to anything. The have a fireplace in the lobby and a pool area. Good place for families

Great hotel! Incredibly clean, friendly and helpful staff. Stayed here for our trip to Disneyland with a short/easy 3 mile drive. Spacious room with nice features (microwave, fridge and bar sink). Would definitely stay here again and highly recommend it!

Our stay at Ayers in Anaheim did not disappoint.  We were here to celebrate our daughter's graduation from Purdue University and this hotel met all of our needs.  It was our home away from home.  Rooms very clean, hot breakfast made fresh, staff was extremely friendly and helpful and loved the fireplace in the lobby.  We will stay again.

The hotel is nice and in a great location. There are several restaurants down the road as well as a movie theatre. And Starbucks. This hotel is close to Disney land. The only issue with the room is there was a slight odor. Not sure if it was the carpet or the room had not been occupied in a while.    The breakfast offered by the hotel was ok and it offered a variety for those who needed a little something to get their day started.  Do not eat at TJ restaurant which is across the street from the hotel. The food is awful.

As always, I had a wonderful time at the Ayres Hotel Anaheim. The staff goes out of their way to make your stay pleasant. This is my go to hotel for Disneyland trips. It‚Äôs a little farther away but still super easy to get to the parks using Uber, Lyft or the city bus (the main Anaheim station is right behind the hotel). Parking is $10 per night and the only way to use the ART bus is through the ‚Äúon demand‚Äù button in the ‚ÄúA way we go‚Äù. If that‚Äôs confusing for you the front desk staff is really helpful and will take the extra time to explain.,  The beds and rooms are spacious and very comfortable.

Breakfast was awesome (and complimentary). Location was great for attending a hockey game at the Honda Center.  Everyone at the hotel was professional, friendly and helpful.  This is the place to stay if you‚Äôre in town for a game.

Always friendly, clean and accomodating.  The hallways are looking a little dank but I suspect a freshing up is due soon.  I've stayed here often. I definitly will check the HONDA Center schedule next time.  The traffic control was terrible and I was stuck 2 blocks from the hotel for 30 minutes.

Chose this Ayres due to it's location. We attended an event nearby and it was easy to walk. We had young children with us. The staff was very friendly and the hotel was clean. It's nice that this location offers breakfast and parking as an amenity.

Summary Heading: The service from Seal Beach, Moreno Valley and Anaheim recently stayed  were very comfortable and appreciative one.
Summary: The quality and service are very consistent and excellent for vacationers. We will highly recommend your hotel for future travellers. If your guest stays over 2-3 weeks in your chain, Ayres hotel should recognize the guest in the more attention.

Very kind and customer-oriented staff. Great Manager addressing all my questions and needs quickly. Excellent breakfast and great cook. Commitment to cleanliness is obvious. Enjoyed my 3 night stay. Wonderful!

We absolutely loved our stay and will be back! The breakfast chef, Jose, was so awesome. Our kids looked forward to seeing him every morning and having him make fresh Mickey pancakes for them. The lady that helped him was awesome too! She kept the dining room clean and running smoothly. Breakfast alone made the stay worth it. We had eggs, fresh potatoes, either sausage or bacon, pancakes, mixed fruit, yogurt, cereal, pastries, toast, bagels, juices, coffee.. really a great assortment. Perfect fuel for park days!  It's a few miles from the park but we used ART and the Away We Go app for "On Demand" rides and never waited more than 10 minutes for a pickup - which was right outside the hotel. Pickup at Disneyland was easy too! Glad we went that route instead of walking from a

The breakfast was very limited and not cooked to order like other Ayres hotels. Very disappointed. The gated parking was difficult to enter and exit. The price was not worth the experience of the limited and quality of the breakfest.

Recently stayed here while getting our kids situated at a nearby university. The hotel is very clean & inviting.  Each employee we interacted with was super friendly and helpful. I can't say enough about how wonderful each person who works at this hotel was. Very thankful for them! The breakfast was perfect. They offer a variety of hot and cold breakfast options from scrambled eggs and pancakes, to small packaged muffins, oatmeal, cereal, fruit and yogurt, etc. It is right off the freeway and our room was on the freeway side but it wasn't really bad. We had a bit of a HVAC issue in our room-it just wasn't cooling off and felt 'swampy'. One of the women working at the front desk tried to reset the thermostat but it wasn't 100%  to where , unfortunately, I had to open the window

Summary Heading: Good for a couple of nights but the road noise is overwhelming
Summary: It looks great on the outside and it is very clean on the inside.  The fitness center is nice but very small, good thing nobody else was there to fight for machines.  A few not so nice notables: it is right between a high way and a major street so the road noise is ever present (they were nice enough to switch rooms for us but it didn‚Äôt help). They really need thicker glass windows. On the other hand, the HVAC is quite loud so it covers up the street noise when it‚Äôs on.  The water pressure is much to be desired and it takes a long time to get hot water.  Lastly, it‚Äôs great to have fresh made breakfast, but the choices are extremely limited and after day two you‚Äôll be looking to head out for breakfast.  I‚Äôd probably give it 3.5 stars if possible, but it is definitely not a 4.
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest,  Thank you for taking the time to write a review based on your recent stay! We are thrilled that you were satisfied with the cleanliness of our hotel. I would like to apologize for any inconvenience you may have encountered regarding the surrounding noise, and the shower water pressure. We aim to provide the most exceptional experiences and are disappointed that we did not successfully do that for you this time around. If you are ever in the area again, we hope to have the chance to welcome you back for an improved visit.  Sincerely,  Susan Golden General Manger

Summary: We had a wonderful experience staying at the Aryes hotel during our Disneyland vacation. The hotel is sparkling clean,  hotel staff were so friendly and make us feel right at home. The hot breakfast was perfect to start the day and the cooks/kitchen staff are excellent.   Taking the shuttle to Disneyland from the hotel was really easy and convenient, we were able to get shuttles very quickly back and forth to the park. This is our second time staying here for a Disney trip and we plan to stay again the next we visit Disneyland.

We (2 Adults and 2 kids) stayed at Ayers for 3 nights.  We had an excellent stay at the hotel. The hotel is close to Disneyland and we took Uber or Lyft (costs $9 to $13) everyday. The room is large enough for people to move around and beds are soft. Breakfast is great (which is free) and includes both hot and cold items. We could sit and enjoy breakfast before heading to Disneyland. There is ample parking at the hotel. Love this place.

Excellent stay. Staff friendly wherever you go. Breakfast delicious with many choices. Accommodations were clean, quiet and welcoming when you walked through the doors. Ayres has a standard that has never let us down. This is the third Ayres property we have tried.  Thank You!!!

Its an ok Hotel. Good breakfast. Friendly staff. I wouldn‚Äôt stay here again. Thermostat wouldn‚Äôt turn off.  Had to have either the heater or the air on. There was a random woman wondering the halls one night asking us to look at her drawings. I had to tell her to stop following my daughter and I.
Manager Response: Dear Keisha B,  Thank you for taking the time to write a review based on your recent stay! We are pleased that you enjoyed our complimentary breakfast  and the service you received from our team. I sincerely apologize for any inconvenience you may have encountered regarding the thermostat and the surrounding disturbances as our  goal is to provide the most exceptional experiences. Please let our team know if you are facing any issues throughout your time with us, so we can work to get them resolved promptly. Your feedback is appreciated, and we hope to have the chance to welcome you back for a 5-star visit the next time you're in town.  Sincerely,  Susan Golden  General Manager

Summary: This is the nicest, most hassle free hotel stay I‚Äôve had in awhile, and we travel quite a bit. The staff is exceedingly friendly and makes sure guests feel cared for.   Thev included a quite nice breakfast that made the morning easy.   The pool area was small & clean.   This has become our go-to hotel whenever we need to be in the area. Why pay Disney‚Äôs high prices when a warm, friendly, easily navigated hotel like this exists?!

Summary Heading: Best hotel for price and location.
Summary: My wife and I spent a week at this hotel for our honeymoon. First impression that got us was the very reasonable pricing and proximity to Disneyland. Once we arrived, we were greeted by friendly staff and that didn‚Äôt stop. We mentioned we were on our honeymoon and within 30 min they knocked on the door with a free bottle of Champaign and chocolates. So kind. From the front desk to the breakfast chef, everyone was so polite and respectful. They had Christmas decorations and a lovely fire going all day and night. The ART transportation (just over $6 a day per person) was easy to use and just like ordering an Uber. They pick you up right outside the hotel and drops you off right at Disneyland gates. Rooms were clean. They have a small gym but with a cable machine, free weights,

We enjoyed our stay so much at Ayres, Anaheim.  The accommodations were super, clean and friendly staff.  Towels were fluffy and bed was comfy. Nice clean pool and hot tub.  We stayed at Ayres, Anaheim because of location to Honda Center and SNA airport.

My husband and I celebrated our 5 year wedding anniversary at Disneyland! I found the Ayres Hotel via mobile web searching and was impressed by the reviews, photos, price, and packages! When we arrived, we were helped out by a kind front desk associate who checked us in seamlessly!   The hotel is quaint and the room/bathroom was clean and well stocked! We also had free parking due to being a Disneyland guest.   The only con I would say is that we were woken up to a knock at 9:30am (assuming it was housekeeping). Before we could answer, they tried to open the door! Our bad for not putting the "do not disturb" sign but definitely would have wanted a heads up as to when they come. I had assumed that they would come after we check out at 12pm.  But besides that, it's the perfect

The location is perfect if you are going to a concert at the Honda center.  The hotel was clean and the hot breakfast in the morning a bonus.  Having old town Orange right there was also a fun surprise.  So cool.  The staff was very friendly and helpful.

Summary Heading: The BEST place to stay for our large groups!
Summary: Deanna and the entire staff at the Ayres Anaheim make handling our large complicated group such a breeze. The Ayres Anaheim is conveniently located, always clean, and the breakfast and chef are the best! We won't stay anywhere else!

The bed was very comfortable  and the breakfast was very delicious.  And only 8mins from Disneyland. Everyones sevice was very friendly. The only negative thing was the day we were leaving the water in the shower was not hot. It was warm /cold.I would stay here again.

Nice and quiet compared to other hotels we've stayed at near Disneyland. The staff was excellent, from the front desk to the cleaning and breakfast staff. So personal, warm and friendly! Great value when we booked with Get Away Today, which included breakfast, parking and free wifi. Would definitely stay here again.

Rated 4 stars and not 5, was due to morning breakfast. Coffeemate regular creamer was spoiled. And orange juice was mostly water, after bringing it to their attention they changed both. Also water in sink in room took a VERY long time to get hot. Our stay was great. Ladies at front desk were very friendly. Hotel very clean, comfortable bed. Across from Honda Center so picked up a hockey game the night we arrived. 4 miles from Disneyland. We will definitely stay again.

big rooms and very friendly staff.  breakfast was delicious.  honda center was across the street so it was easy getting to and from.  i do love that there is a mini fridge and microwave inside the room.  got to enjoy the hot tub and pool on this trip.  there were ants around the hot tub area so be careful setting items around that area, ants ended up crawling on my towel before i noticed them.

I booked two nights stay here because I was going to an event at the Honda Center across the street. Being walking distance was unbelievably convenient - the night of the event, we had to return to our hotel room to drop off one of our two purses because it did not meet the small size requirement. We had plenty of time to walk back to our room, and then return to the event without missing anything. But the hotel itself was just a little gem. The room I stayed in with my mother was very comfortable. We had plenty of space with two queen beds, as well as a dresser, desk, and even a small sitting table with two chairs if we wanted to eat at a table. I was very surprised to see not only a nice sized bathroom sink, but there was also a small bar sink in the corner where the coffee

Excellent Hotel and Staff! I went to a concert at Honda center.  It was a 2 min walk away. The whole staff and especially Susan the manager were first rate.  She helped me get a reservation next door before the concert.  Room was clean and comfortable.

Summary Heading: A great stay bc of great staff
Summary: I recently spent 2 weeks in Anaheim for work. This was my 1st stay at Ayers but it won't be my last. The bed was so comfortable, the staff so friendly, AND it is such a better price than other hotels in the area.  I highly recommend!

Summary Heading: My visit was amazing everything was very close by and there was a lot to go do.
Summary: This hotel was great! The whole time we were there the staff were nothing but helpful and friendly. The rooms and overall hotel was very clean and quite the cleaning lady‚Äôs come by every single day and they do respect the privacy sign and the breakfast was very good! it was about a 2 minute drive to downtown Disney and Disneyland Parking. Whenever I have another trip I definitely plan to book it at another or the same Ayres Hotel overall 10/10 for experience :)

I stay at this hotel for business often over the last 10 years and it just seems to get better and better.  The reason the company puts me here is because the price is right but the reason I stay is because it‚Äôs really like my home away from home.  It‚Äôs super clean, the beds are amazing, lots of pillows,  they have a free breakfast in the morning and the staff are always so nice!

First time staying at Ayers. Staff are friendly,  the hotel is very clean and the self parking is close and convenient.  The free breakfast in the morning is a nice touch. I was impressed with the wide selection that was offered.  The chef in the venue was cooking to order, and was super personal and accommodating.

We found the staff very helpful and friendly!  We were there for the VPHS 1972 50-year reunion.  We loved our stay there.  The location was centrally located to what we wanted to do.  Very close to Anaheim Stadium if you want to see an Angel's game.

Summary Heading: Nice hotel; requires some maintenance forethought, perhaps?
Summary: The Ayres is a beautiful hotel in a good, fairly quiet location, with a very kind and responsive staff. Unfortunately, our stay was marred with some circumstantial unpleasantries. When we arrived, the toilet wasn't working in our room. Meanwhile, we're all getting ready to go to a wedding and using the lobby bathroom. It took multiple maintenance visits to get it resolved. The mini-fridge was leaking water inside, so a few of our food items were ruined. But the real kicker was waking up at 4am to the fire alarm screaming at us that the battery was low. We called downstairs and they said to take the battery out, so my luckily-very-tall fiance clambered half asleep onto the bed to fiddle with it and was finally able to silence it. The next morning (Sunday), the vacuuming started

Tricia, who handles corporate business accounts and rates was a pure pleasure to work with.  She set my account up quickly and was a joy work alongside, with an upbeat personality and great follow through!   Ayres has found a gem in Tricia.   Stay was great, clean hotel at always, with a pleasant staff and great vibe.    -Tony

I stayed two nights in this very friendly hotel. Staff is very helpful, rooms are clean. Breakfast is complimentary, which is a big plus and it's only12 minutes from Disneyland. Would highly recommend the Ayres Hotel.

Summary Heading: Great location for Honda Center events
Summary: Great location to Honda Center.  My wife and I enjoyed ourselves.  Even thogh the Ducks beat the Kraken on opening night, we will be back.  The hotel was clean and the breakfast buffet was a great addition when we arrived early.

Wonderful overnight trip! Bed was very comfortable. Room was clean and smelled good. Staff was friendly and helpful when we request more coffee and extra pillow. Will definitely stay at Ayres hotel again

Great hotel and staff is awesome. If you have an event at the Honda Center this is the place to stay. Two crosswalks and your in the Honda Center‚Äôs parking lot. Breakfast was a nice surprise. There is also a fantastic restaurant one crosswalk away.

We stayed at the Ayres because we had a concert right across the street. The convenience and food choices were perfect! It was the easiest check in and check out process. Plenty of water pressure and hot water in the bathroom which is always a plus! We stayed in a pet room which was very clean (although there were some women's hairs on the bath towels...ick!) The sheets were spotless though unlike many pet hotels. The pillows were comfortable. The beds could stand to be updated, but not the worst. Appreciated the microwave and refrigerator. The only other update it could use is some MORE LIGHT in the bathroom area. Very difficult to get makeup on without proper lighting. Better breakfast provided than some of the other hotels that include it. We would definitely stay here again

Summary Heading: Can't go wrong with Ayres Hotels
Summary: I've stayed at this particular Ayres before, as well as two others in Riverside County.  Always have been provided with clean, comfortable, quiet rooms, attentive staff, very good complimentary breakfasts.

Very nice and comfortable hotel.  Conveniently located across the street from Honda Center!  You can walk to Angel Stadium and bus terminal.  One restaurant in walking distance if you don't have a car.

Summary Heading: Wonderful hotel; nicest we've stayed in near the airport
Summary: Very nice, quiet, comfortable, hotel with amenities.  Everything was top notch. Very nice, well priced restaurant and outdoor patio.  Don't even THINK of going elsewhere for breakfast.  Our new fave in the area.

Excellence room and service. Breakfast was great.. So close to Honda center and the train station and best of all it's next to the Little Saigon area there's a lot of choices for Asian foods and entertainment. We're happy with the choise..

Staff members were very nice. Rooms were clean, comfy, and quiet. Even on main floor it wasn‚Äôt noisy at all. Breakfast the next morning was plenty and yummy. The cook had a great personality and was very nice. Hotel is conveniently located. An easy walk across the street to the Honda Center. We felt safe and relaxed! Would definitely stay here again!

There were a lot of good things about this hotel: The proximity to Honda Center was very convenient and allowed us to walk about 5 minutes across a huge intersection without worrying about parking at the venue. The staff was super friendly and helpful, the pool was lovely and well maintained, the room was quite sound proof, and the bed was comfortable. I liked the 4th floor view we had of the freeway (really!) and found it relaxing to watch the steady stream of cars. Three things weren't so good: The water pressure in the shower was low. A major pet peeve of ours. Also relating to the shower, there was no hair conditioner. Only "conditioning shampoo." For two people with long, wavy hair, this was a problem. We ended up buying our own conditioner. And finally, the climate control
Manager Response: Dear Diana O.,  Thank you for taking the time to write a review based on your recent stay! We are thrilled you found our team members friendly and our beds comfortable. I sincerely apologize for any inconvenience you encountered regarding the bathroom amenities we offer and the temperature in the guest room. If you are ever facing any issues throughout your time with us, please let our team know so we can work to get them resolved promptly. Your feedback is appreciated, and we hope to have the opportunity to welcome you back for a 5-star visit.   Sincerely,  Susan Golden General Manager

Summary Heading: Good to see some things haven't changed - sad to see some thing have.
Summary: We have stayed here on numerous occasions over the years and find the hotel a great base to access all what the area and beyond has to offer.  Our last two visits coincided with concerts at The Honda Center directly over the road and The Grove just a short walk away next to The Angel Stadium and it was a great benefit to avoid the traffic and just make the short walk back to the hotel after the events.  The Artic Hub is just around the corner which we used to get a Train to LA Union Station and allowed access to the metro system that had routes to Hollywood, Universal City etc. which avoided the traffic and the extortionate parking rates in these prime tourist hot spots.  Our first few visits here included free parking, however, they inplemented a $10 per night parking charge

In town for a  concert plus the theme park experience.  This met every need.  Staff was helpful and friendly,  rooms were well appointed, clean and equipped with all required amenities.  Complimentary breakfast was great, good variety and made fresh continually.   2 min walk to Honda center!! 5 min drive to Disney parking.  5 min drive to many restaurants and shops.  Nice clean pool area with dedicated towels.  No train or freeway noise.  Very affordable parking on hotel lot.   Highly recommend this hotel   :)

Hotal is adjacent to Honda Center. The location was perfect to walk to and from the concert.  The room was clean and well equipped.  Snacks available to purchase in hotel lobby.  Included breakfast which was great.  Overall, I was happy. I would stay again if I should get to attend another concert.

The people were nice and everything at this hotel was good. The room, TV stations, breakfast, and amenities were all perfect. If I look for a complaint it's that they don't have all the food and drinks at the concierge that a convenience store does, but of course they don't. I was impressed enough to write this review, which is a wow from me.

I came to the hotel for a quick one night stay because I was in town for a concert. The room was bigger than I expected and was very comfortable. The staff was very nice and helpful.  The hotel was in very short walking distance to the Honda center and I had a great stay.

Summary Heading: We enjoyed our stay at Ayres Anaheim
Summary: We had been staying at Ayres Anaheim for 15 years.    We love the warm breakfast, run by Mr Jose.   The staff is very freindly and helpful.   Jose had been running the breakfast area for more than 20 years......that tells you the staff love what they are doing.  Hank

Summary Heading: Great location to stay for viewing an Angel's baseball game for those without cars
Summary: Short walking distance for those without transportation to watch the Angel's baseball game, less than 10 minutes.  Walking about 10 minutes, great selections of restaurants for lunch and dinners.  Very short ride share to Disneyland area. Free breakfast buffet.

The hotel was exceptionally clean, the staff was super helpful, the room was very comfortable. What you might not know is that the transportation options are super convenient ARTIC ( the transportation hub for Anaheim) is less than a block away and ART the local transportation for everything is on demand and very reasonable.

We liked everything about this hotel. We stayed 5 nights in August. Our room on the 4th floor was quiet, a/c kept the room comfortable  and the king size bed was one of the nicest I‚Äôve slept on (at home or in a hotel). The neighborhood and parking felt secure, and the pool was well maintained. The helpful friendly staff never failed to greet us and gave us good directions, and the complimentary breakfast included eggs, potatoes, pancakes (made to order), bacon or sausage (on alternating days) and fresh fruit.  We were blocks from Angel‚Äôs Stadium- we walked- and across the street from the Honda Center as well as the Anaheim metro link station, and a short distance from Christ Cathedral. We had rented our car at SNA and we were able to attend baseball games, go to mass, go to

It was a great hotel, beds were comfy and the shower was spacious. The pool was excellent to cool off on a sunny day. Breakfast was fresh as someone was there preparing it. Lot of options with food cereals and juices. Perfect stay

Check in was easy. The room was clean and ready for us upon arrival. The staff was friendly. Breakfast  options were limited but good. The chef was very friendly.  The AC,  which is an under the window unit,  was really loud. Sounded like a helicopter was overhead.

Summary Heading: Easy walking distance for baseball game at Angel Stadium.
Summary: My first time at an Ayers hotel. Chose there to attend several games at Angel stadium, which is a easy 10-15 minute walk.  During my stay every employee encounter was pleasant and seems like they enjoyed being at work.  Breakfast was basic with sausage,eggs and potatoes and various bread and pastries. But what made breakfast enjoyable was the chef who was cheerful, friendly and conversational even though it was busy at times. We asked the front desk personnel several questions during our stay and they were helpful and knowledgeable about clarifying things for us. They provided a small refrigerator and microwave which comes in handy for leftovers or just keeping and heating store bought food. The A/C in the room kept the room cool and comfortable. The only con about the room was

I enjoyed my stay for many reasons....It was easy to get to, it was walking distance to the baseball game so I didn't have to deal with traffic and mostly, the employees are extremely friendly and very helpful with questions. The room was clean and nice and since I was traveling alone I felt very safe at the hotel and walking back and forth to the game at night.

Went to visit for baseball game. Location is perfect. Restaurant across the street and short walk from Angel stadium. Outstanding customer service, spacious clean room, and good hot breakfast. We had such a pleasant experience that this will now be where we stay every time we visit Angel stadium.

Pros were proximity to Angels stadium ( short walk), great breakfast, very nice, friendly and  helpful staff, pool was nice, small but clean exercise room with well kept machines.  Cons - traffic noise, we had to change out of two rooms because of musty smell ( we were told carpets had been done recently - staff showed us  room on 1st floor that-had been re modeled and had laminate floors so no smell and they moved us there) I thought it was a bit pricey, but it is a resort area.
Manager Response: Dear Mary M.,  Thank you for your rating and review! We are pleased you found our team members friendly and that you enjoyed our complimentary breakfast. I sincerely apologize for any inconvenience you encountered regarding the surrounding noise and scent of our guest rooms. Our goal is to provide the most exceptional experiences, and we appreciate your feedback as we are always open to hearing ways we can improve. If you are ever in the area again, we hope to have the chance to welcome you back for a 5-star visit.  Sincerely,  Susan Golden General Manager

Summary: Very clean, staff are very friendly and helpful, breakfast is soo good!!  Our room was cleaned  daily, with fresh towels and linen. Service was 5 star! Work out room a little small.  Close to transit station walkable.  I only gave it 4 stars because  common areas could use a little up date . I would stay again great location

Summary Heading: Great location but can‚Äôt adjust temp in room
Summary: Great location close to Chapman University. However, we could not adjust the temperature in our room other than to alternate between heat or cool. Alternating between extremes, especially while trying to sleep, made for a less than ideal stay. A call to the front desk amounted only to directions that didn‚Äôt match up with the wall thermostat in the room. We will stay elsewhere when visiting Orange over the next few years.
Manager Response: Dear Kristen N.,  Thank you for taking the time to write a review based on your recent stay! We are thrilled you found our hotel to be in a great location. I sincerely apologize for any inconvenience you encountered regarding our air conditioning system. Our goal is to provide the most exceptional experiences, and we are disappointed we did not successfully do that for you this time. We hope to have the chance to welcome you back for an improved visit the next time you're in the area.  Sincerely,  Susan Golden General Manager

Summary: The front desk people were super-friendly and greeted us everytime we walked in or out.  Even the really-busy breakfast cook was super friendly.   It was a nice place to stay while moving in my son to school.

We drove in from L.A. for the One Republic concert at the Honda Center on a Friday afternoon. Horrendous traffic ‚Äîtook 2 1/2 hours. After that, what a pleasure this hotel was!  Friendly, efficient check-in, comfortable room with a bathtub, nice tv, so convenient to the venue & a fun restaurant. Breakfast was also friendly & efficient. This will be our new go-to place when in Anaheim. No need to pay those ridiculous prices at Disneyland resorts.   Well done, Ayres!

Summary Heading: Excellent hotel at a very reasonable rate!
Summary: Amazing staff were very friendly and helpful. The room was very nice and felt very clean. The breakfast in the morning was really good too. It is full service with a chef available for anything you need. He was super nice and friendly.  Definitely will return.

This hotel was more than I expected.  1) Rooms were very clean and comfortable.  2) Pool area was simple but fantastic.  3)Electric Chargers available.  4) Breakfast food was FANTASTIC and the Chef was a delight to get to know.  5) 5 min walk to Angels stadium.   Highly recommend this place for trip to see the Angels or Ducks... or a family trip to Disneyland.

Everyone we interacted with was wonderful! Our room was always cleaned everyday by the sweetest lady, breakfast was cooked by the most awesome, enigmatic guy, and the front desk was always helpful. I apologize I don't remember staff members' names. We were here with our two kids for Disneyland and Universal Studios and it was perfect! Access to ART Shuttle was super easy too. Highly recommended!

Huge bang for the buck, clean, great breakfast included, convenient location, management and staff deserve kudos! I will return.  One more thing about the included breakfast‚Ä¶ There is a cook on staff preparing pancakes, potatoes etc. Pretty darn cool for a hotel that includes breakfast with your stay.

Summary Heading: Pleasant staff comfortable, clean and spacious rooms
Summary: Very roomy, comfortable beds, clean hotel throughout. Nice pool and spa area and workout room was clean a little small but adequate. The elevators are tucked in a room so not noisy as other hotels when we had a room near the elevators.

Staying at The Ayres hotel is always a pleasant and fun experience. The hotel staff is always friendly and accommodating. This makes our stay extremely easy and carefree, something that keeps bringing us back every year! We appreciate all you do for us and look forward to seeing you again next time! Dorian Valles Glacier Falls FSC Volunteer Chair Glacier Falls Secretary

this hotel was perfect. nice clean, large rooms. very quiet, especially considering that its located close to so much sports and entertainment activity. the breakfast was amazing, hot food including eggs, bacon, and pancakes to choose from. the air conditioner worked great in the room as well. we will definitely stay here again.

Our stay started at check-in which is perfect. Their customer service is stellar. The bed is so comfortable The room temperature is adjustable to your taste and I love that. Sometimes when you stay at a hotel the room doesn't get as cool as you like  but at Ayers they leave it up to you. The breakfast is amazing ,fresh and satisfying. The pool is beautiful. I enjoyed my morning coffee while my husband swam. They are pet friendly which we need and appreciate.

This was one of the best stays we have ever had.   Walking distance to the Angels game.  Staff was fabulous, bfast was very tasty with real bacon.  The room was laid out perfectly.  I can‚Äôt say enough about this place.

Our basketball team stayed here for a tournament at the Open Gym Premier venue which was only 6 minutes away. The Ayres is in a great location, close to so many things and was spotless! By far, one of my favorite hotels!  I worked with Deanna on all the details for our team and she was excellent to work with and so helpful with any questions I had. Every single person I came into contact with was beyond friendly. The hot breakfast was one of the best in all the hotels we have stayed at and even though it was very busy, everyone on staff in the breakfast room was patient and kind. We declined having our room cleaned, but I did get fresh towels and anything else we needed from the sweet, smiling housekeeper I saw daily. I loved our double queen room with a divider between the

This was my first time here , the service was fantastic, My room was very big and smelled really clean.  Housekeeping was so kind to asking if i wanted  the bathroom clean while I was. I'm definitely gonna keep staying there

Summary Heading: Best for concerts at Honda Center
Summary: If you are doing anything in the area specifically the Honda Center, this is your place. Friendly service, clean rooms, breakfast and the little convenience section in the front had all you need, even at midnight after a concert at Honda. We got dinner and beer before and after the show.

We enjoyed our stay.  The staff were friendly and welcoming.  The included breakfast was delicious and plenty of options to choose from.  I enjoyed my conversations at breakfast with the Chef and other guests.  Looking forward to staying here in the future.  Thank you!

The staff was super friendly and helpful! The room was very clean and comfortable. The hotel was right across the street from Honda Center where I had Stray Kids concerts to see. The picture is me standing at the Honda Center and taking a picture of the hotel. I would definitely stay here again!

We took my son on a California adventure for his 16th birthday. I have nothing but good things to say about this hotel. The place was absolutely spotless, the staff were all very friendly(our favourite was Jos√©, the breakfast cook). The pool and hot tub is nice and was never too crowded. The gym has nice cardio machines as well.  5-7 minutes drive to Disneyland, 5 minute walk to Angel‚Äôs Stadium ‚öæÔ∏è, 1 minute walk to Honda Center üèí. JT Schmitz restaurant is across the street too and it‚Äôs a cool little spot with outdoor seating, bar and screens.  The best part of the hotel in my opinion is the breakfast, which is included in the price.   This is our second time staying here and it won‚Äôt be put last!

Lovely and spacious rooms.  Breakfast (included) freshly cooked.  Staff friendly and accommodating. Close to a variety of wonderful restaurants, transportation and Disney.  On site parking available.   I will be back!!

great customer service!!!   delicious breakfast! comfy beds! We rented 11 rooms for our girl scout troop and they were very accomodating with us.  They had a great attitude I like the fact that we are close to disney driving distance not walking distance but away from all the chaos.

Stayed here for years but after yesterday‚Ä¶.. Started when our shower drain backed up and being an ADA shower it flooded onto the bathroom floor. Call the desk (11:30pm) and explain the problem (meanwhile my wife still needed a shower).  After 30 minutes of no action I walk to the front desk where the manager was busy selling beer to people who just got out of a concert across the street and many of them not staying at the hotel but asking for a bathroom key.       The desk manager explained he didn‚Äôt have time right now to help me.  I asked for a couple of wash cloths so my wife could at least wipe off but again, he was too busy to leave the desk.  It was now after midnight and had to get up early so I told him to forget it and I‚Äôll make a complaint in the morning.  Meanwhile
Manager Response: Dear Mark T.,  Thank you for returning to stay with us and taking the time to write a review! I sincerely apologize for any inconvenience you encountered regarding the service you received from our team and the shower drain. Our goal is to provide the most exceptional experiences, and we are disappointed we did not successfully do that for you this time. Your feedback is appreciated, and we hope to have the opportunity to welcome you back the next time you're in the area for the stellar accommodations you are most familiar with.  Sincerely,  Susan Golden General Manager

Summary: This was perfect if you are going to visit for a ball game at Angel Stadium of Anaheim or Honda Center. We came in on the Amtrak, went across the street to check in to the Ayres hotel to freshen up then walked back up the street 5 minutes to Angel Stadium. The hotel is clean, beds are comfy, staff very accommodating and friendly. Highly recommend staying here. We will always stay here when visiting for a ball game!

Summary Heading: Comfy, friendly staff, easy freeway access
Summary: A++ service! The staff are super friendly! The beds are so comfy! The showers are huge! I love that it wasn‚Äôt in a super busy area (at least at the time - since it is across the street from the Honda Center and A‚Äôs stadium - there were no events during our stay) easy access to freeways and tons of shopping and restaurants near by!

We came to Anaheim for my son‚Äôs birthday. We used to stay at the Ayres Hotel years ago and mainly because it‚Äôs not too close to Disneyland or full of kids but close enough to Disneyland if we wanted to visit. I was hoping it would be the same experience as years ago and definitely did not disappoint. The staff is really nice. The hotel is still clean. The pool was perfect. The hot breakfast bar is always amazing so I can fill up the teens before heading to Disneyland.

The room was very nice, the breakfast was great, everyone was very friendly.  The only thing we didn't like is that our room had a bad odor to it.  Would be nice if they used some type of deodorizer in each room.

it gave me good pleasure to stay at Ayres hotel in Anaheim. On my family trip five years back, I stayed and liked it. I did my 2nd time again at the same hotel due to their quality of service. It was a pleasant stay. The services are good and the morning breakfast was awesome. Quick responses from the front desk in case of any issues.  The only problem is missing a water fountain or filtered water on all floors, instead, it had only 1st floor.

The hotel, our rooms, and the experience was absolutely perfect. We were extremely happy with everything, our stay could not have been any better. Very helpful and friendly staff. Great location, great amenities, great service, great value for the money. Will definitely stay at the Ayres hotel again. Thank you......

If you are going to a game, this is a great hotel as you can walk to the park.  This hotel is also close to the ART transportation center which could make location convenient should you need a bus or train.  It is also a short ride from the Disneyland area.  There were many rideshare options

I stayed at the hotel for nights, and I am sorry to say that we were not much satisfied with the stay. The room smelled kind of old and musty which was not pleasant. The bed and pillow were not comfortable. There were car drifting very early in the morning (around 1am-2am) on the road just next to the hotel, it made us waking up. However. the staff was very kind and professional.
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest,  Thank you for your rating and review! We are pleased to see you were satisfied with the service you received from our team. I sincerely apologize for any inconvenience you encountered regarding the comfort of our guest rooms and the surrounding noise. Our goal is to provide the most exceptional experiences, and we are disappointed that we did not successfully do that for you this time. Your feedback is appreciated, and we hope to have the chance to welcome you back for a 5-star visit sometime soon.  Sincerely,  Susan Golden General Manager

Summary: Such a great hotel. All of the staff were very kind and courteous. The room was very clean and spacious. The gentleman making breakfast for everyone was very nice and funny. We love this hotel and will always try to stay here when it's not sold out!

Summary Heading: In town for family visit. Good location comfortable room and very nice hotel.
Summary: Nice hotel.  easy reservations on the phone, they  paid attention to having a hypoallergenic room ready when we got there, (usually others get it wrong)  comfortable beds and room, they have a hot breakfast that is cooked at the hotel, fresh!  Parking is on site; only $10 night  Pool is super clean. I‚Äôd recommend this place to friends. We could see fireworks display from Angles win, exciting!

Smooth check in process, within walking distance of Angels stadium, great breakfast. Room could use an update but was clean. Flew into SNA airport, 20-30 minute drive. Right across the street from Honda Center. Would stay here again.

This was honestly one of the best hotels we've stayed in! The rooms were very spacious and super clean. The house keeping did such an amazing job keeping the room organized and clean daily. The staff was exceptional nice and very helpful with everything throughout the stay. The hot breakfast has a huge selection. There is even a chief to make you fresh pancakes!

Summary Heading: Excellent place to stay in Anaheim
Summary: We really liked the room condition and enjoyed the breakfast. The only comment I have for the hotel is that the bus service App may need to be upgraded. I think it confuses the costumers and the drivers.

Ayres Anaheim is always great, check in clerk named Heaven was very pleasant, fast, and courteous.  The room was VERY clean and well appointed.  Breakfast was Delicious and so filling.  Check out was a beeze.

The room was in good condition but the cleaning was inadequate. The toilet had feces around the rim and back of it. There was hair all over the bed and other places in the room. Thankfully I carry Lysol and disinfectant wipes with me everywhere.
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest,  Thank you for taking the time to write a review based on your recent stay! I want to extend my most sincere apology for any inconvenience you encountered regarding the cleanliness of our guest room. Our goal is to provide the most exceptional experiences, and we are disappointed that we did not successfully do that for you this time. If you are ever facing any issues throughout your time with us, please let our team know so we can work to get them resolved promptly. We hope to have the opportunity to welcome you back for a 5-star visit soon.   Sincerely,  Susan Golden  General Manager

Summary Heading: Great choice especially when heading to the Angels game
Summary: Easy to find. Easy to park. Easy to check in. Very nice check in staff . Nice rooms with extra space. Easy walk to Angels stadium in daylight . Easy Uber back to hotel . Affordable rate. I would return for sure. I have recently started staying at Ayer‚Äôs properties and have been very pleased with them. I am someone that spends 30++ nights/ year in hotels.

Summary Heading: They don't offer service to the air port.
Summary: I was happy that you didn't off any service to the Air port.  I spend over $1000 us for 5 days, and  I had to find my own way to the air port.  Most hotel I have stay offer service to the air port.  I won't be staying there in the future.

Loved the hotel. Very clean. Rooms great size. Location fantastic and easy to get to right off the freeway. Close to lots of restaurants; some you can walk to. The Honda center is across the street and can also walk there. Perfect for any event you may be going there to see. Beds and pillows very comfortable. The breakfast was exceptional; which is included in the stay. Definitely would recommend staying here.

Great hotel for Angels game within walking distance.  Clean, quiet.  Good complimentary breakfast. Friendly staff with easy checkin/out. Would stay here again and recommend to others visiting the area for a game.

Summary Heading: I would highly recommend this hotel
Summary: I would highly recommend this hotel, I have stayed here many times and will be back again :) the hotel and rooms are very clean and comfortable. great location for just about anything. breakfast is always great! the staff is always helpful and provide great service!

Hotels clean staff was very friendly me and my family felt very safe we had a great time. Hotel was close to everything shopping restaurants Beach hotel  was very clean. Breakfast was good. The front staff was knowledgeable on restaurant pics and shopping centers

The angels won and the hotel was great too. Pool was warm. Breakfast was awesome. We will come back here soon. Wouldn't stay anywhere else. Walk to the stadium. Happy hour Monday through Thursday.  You can't beat it.

Summary Heading: 2 bedroom (+sofa bed), 2 bath without AirBB fees! Cheap parking, good breakfast, convenient location and lovely staff
Summary: Was looking for either an Air B and or a Suite hotel for a trip to Disney. In my research , the fees and cleaning fees with the Air B ad B were huge. My goals were-a unit with 2 full bathrooms and 2 separate sleeping areas, reasonable parking fee, free breakfast and a pool. Luckily, I called the Ayres as they don‚Äôt show all  the rooms on their website. I booked a ‚ÄòSuperior Suite‚Äô with a special rate of about $180 per night. The room had one entrance to the corridor but then a solid door b/t one king bedroom (with TV) ad separate bathroom. The other side had one King bed, a sitting area, micro, small fridge and sink and additional full bathroom. Tubs were large.  Parking was $10 per day w in/out privileges. Breakfast was actually good-we tried the potatoes, eggs, bacon, bagels,

I've stayed at this hotel location many times and I would highly recommend it. First, it's located close to all the attractions, restaurants and right off the freeway.  Hotel staff is wonderful. They check you in quickly and are willing to help you with a smile. There are several Tesla charging ports located in the back parking close to the rear entrance and breakfast is better than most.

The staff (Christin) were very friendly and accommodating to our needs. The rooms were nice and clean. We enjoyed the complimentary hot breakfast and delicious coffee. Our kids had a fun time hanging out at the pool and it‚Äôs close to a lot of fun things to do. I will definitely stay here again!

My wife abs I had a great visit. Even though it was our first visit to this location we know when we stay at Ayres we‚Äôre getting a nice hotel abs good value. Love the Continental breakfast and the fact that someone is actually cooking your pancakes right in front of you

I chose this hotel based on other reviews and was not disappointed. My kids are teens now and it was not important to be within walking distance of Disneyland as I wanted when they were young. We easily used Uber to get anywhere, walked across the street to enjoy the baseball game and realized the train station is also right there for next time adventures to beach towns or wherever. Parking is well set up if you do have a car. Jose and the breakfast team are friendly and fantastic (great hot breakfast and coffee!) and all staff we interacted with were wonderful. They are happy to answer your questions and accommodate any requests (wine opener, extra towels and soap, cutlery etc.).  The only thing I would recommend is that you plan a grocery stop and your dinner destinations in

Great staff, clean rooms, comfortable beds and a great breakfast. Check in and and check out were very quick and simple. Parking was easy and convenient if attending an event at Honda Center or Angel Stadium...both within walking distance.

Very clean well kept hotel. Located between the Honda Center and Angels stadium. One restaurant close by others approx 10 minute walk. Friendly and helpful staff. Breakfast is not really made to order but still good. Most mornings either bacon or sausage, scrambled eggs, potatoes and pancakes as hot choices. Really liked the vinyl plank flooring in room rather than carpet hope all hotels do this so much easier to keep clean and smell free.

Stayed here overnight for a late Disneyland event. Starting with checking in, the front desk staff was great. The room was awesome, very good sized. The king sized bed was sssoooo comfy, especially after a long night at Disneyland. Was surprised at the size of the bathtub, so nice and roomy. I have no complaints, would absolutely stay again.

The hotel was found quickly once leaving the freeway. The greeting was nice and pleasant and the clerk was upbeat. The room was clean and the water was hot which at some hotels is a problem. The breakfast hours were adequate

Great place to stay for concert night or Disney. The breakfast is delicious and location is great. I think the price is a bargain for what you get. I will definitely go back for concerts and Disney trip. Family oriented.

Summary Heading: The best place to stay for an Angels game or Ducks game!!!
Summary: This hotel is clean, Efficient, friendly and sooo convenient. We go to UCLA childrens hospital and while not the closest hotel it lets us go to angels and ducks games with such ease. I don‚Äôt have to worry about driving or parking. Just check in and enjoy.  We also scheduled a downtown Disney ride with the help of the front desk staff. And we he full breakfast (with Mickey pancakes for the kids) was wonderful.  This is my go to in Anaheim

From check in to check out just a great experience. All of the staff was amazing and helpful. The most comfortable hotel bed I  have ever slept on.  Walking distance to the Honda Center and Angels Stadium. Will definitely stay here again.

Summary Heading: Perfect hotel to walk to and from Angels Stadium! Great Group Rates!
Summary: I booked this Ayres Hotel for our Girl Scout Troop as we were participating in the Girl Scout Night at the Angels Stadium. The Sales Manager was very prompt on my email request for a group rate and we were very pleased with the price. On the day of check-in they were very accommodating to trying to get all of our rooms on the same floor so the Girl Scouts could all be together. The pool was fun bonus! This hotel is prime location for our Troop to be able to walk to and from the Angels Stadium, allowing us to save on parking and fun for the troop to walk together to the game. Beds and pillows were comfortable. A/C was cold. Tub was nice and wide/deep for kids to take a bath. And the hot breakfast is always a favorite at the Ayres Hotel and a main reason we like to stay at Ayres

We stayed at Ayres hotel Anaheim on 04/24/2022.  We have stayed at this hotel for years many times and always all the workers and hotel very nice .  However, on 04/24/22 around 1:35 PM we arrived this hotel and I went to the front desk to check in as we had reservation and mentioned arriving time 1-2 PM.  The front desk staff, Joseph at the time stated that check in is at 3.00 PM and I have to come back at 3:00 PM.  I went to our car and stayed there along with my husband under the temperature of 87 to 90 degree outside.  I have to mention that both of us are seniors and it was very hot and was very uncomfortable for us.  When we were in our car, we noticed that people going inside and check in and hotel have room for them.  Then, around 2:00 PM I decided to come back to the

Cute hotel, very easily accessible, 15 minutes from Disneyland. Clean hotel, clean room, comfortable bed and fantastic pillows!  Very friendly and would recommend! Have a dedicated parking lot at reasonable hotel cost.

I cant say enough good about Ayres Hotels. Its now the only hotel I will stay at. The staff is riendly and helpful. This hotel is beyond clean and it shows! It makes you feel good and safe with everything being so clean and sanitized. the whole hotel is updated nothing seems old an doutdated. There are no bad smells when you enter the hotel or the rooms, as I experienced from other hotels I statyed at. Ayres hotels are gorgeous! Their lobbies are so welcing and inviting. One had a waterfall the other a gorgeos fireplace.  And the rooms, the rooms are so spacious. I felt like I was more in a little studio apartment then hotel room. I travel alot for work and the most important to me is the beds and pillows!  Ayres beds are extremly comfortable and the pillows! Ahh the pillows are

Excellent experience. Room was clean, staff friendly, breakfast great. If you're a sports fan close to the hockey arena and baseball stadium. About 2 miles from Disney, if you insist on visiting that place.

The hotel is lovely and easy to find.  Shuttle options available but on demand so plan accordingly.  Breakfast in the morning was good. Lots of seating available.   The picture attached is the room key is to keep the lights and ac on. Which we thought was cool.

Everything was fantastic!  All the staff were extremely friendly and professional. The hotel was very clean.  The beds and pillows were amazing. I slept better than I do at home. I liked that a small patio was available for smoking.

Best hotel when it comes to safety, friendliness, cleanliness and luxurious feel.  Its prime location makes this hotel a must  place to stay‚Ä¶close to disneyland Anahiem stadium, and everything else ‚Ä¶. On top of that you get free breakfast buffet‚Ä¶ what else can you ask for??? A++++++++++

This hotel is a great place to stay! I've stayed here many times and will be back! Great employees, breakfast and very clean rooms! They even have a fantastic meeting area we used for one of our meetings. Great place!

Ayers hotel Anaheim is a consistent very good. The staff are friendly and knowledgeable.  We have stayed at this particular Ayers hotel because of its location that makes our visit enjoyable and easy to get to the locations we need to get to.  The chef, Jose, prepares a very good fresh egg breakfast. Bacon or sausage on alternating days along with potatoes. The dining area is nice and the coffee is better than most places we‚Äôve stayed at. Jose is also very out going and easy to converse with. Also included are pancakes with different breads, juices and fresh fruit.  In addition to the above Ayers hotel staff were very helpful in conducting some business matters that needed better computer skills than we possessed. Amanda went out of her way to assist us and complete our

This hotel was very nice and I enjoy my room. The bed was super comfy. The only thing that was a little crazy was the parking situation but would definitely stay again. Didn't get a chance to eat the breakfast provided but other guest said it was delicious.

We felt the property was well maintained. Excellent choice if you need to go the Honda Center. We could walk there, didn't have to pay for their parking. The full breakfast was excellent! Most hotels nowadays only serve continental which is ok but we would prefer Full Breakfast. The bed was so very perfect! Shower was very strong a lot of power which we loved. Staff was very kind. It felt so good and we are looking forward to staying here again!

My wife and I were attending a concert at the Honda Center and we decided to stay the night here (instead of driving home after the concert).  Overall, I liked this hotel and would stay here again (if attending an event at the Honda Center or Anaheim Stadium).  The room we stayed in was clean and included everything that you would expect in a mid-range hotel chain.  The (included) breakfast was well above average yet the parking situation...come on...$10 parking fee?  Oh well.  The hotel, overall, was clean...yet the 3rd floor elevator lobby smelled...funky...hard to define other than very old standing water (surprised that the hotel staff does not notice this).

Summary Heading: Extremely friendly staff.  Helpful and personable.
Summary: I would love to stay in one of their hotels again.  Loved the fridge and microwave oven!  Loved the slightly larger tub.  Access to water 24/7 was a huge plus.  The cook was extremly nice and made us feel more at home.  Free parking was also a bonus.  Loved the secure parking area.

This is the first time we (well travelled) stayed at at Ayres property and the first time attending an event at the Honda Center.  We found it a bit pricey and inappropriate to charge for guest parking in this area.  However, the location was TERRIFIC fr attending an event at Honda, nice to come out of the event in the evening and only a short walk to our comfy room.  Room was very comfy and in good condition. Fluffy towels. The  gym was small but well equipped.  The pool was unattractive and right next to the parking lot..not a fun place to hang out.  The staff at the desk and housekeeping were EXCELLENT and very helpful.  Breakfast was hot and nice variety with ample seating for a full house (breakfast staff need to cleanup after guests vacate instead of leaving dirty tables).

The beds and pillows could be better they aren‚Äôt fluffy or comfy. I appreciate them cleaning after our first night. The shower head leaks if you face it a certain way. Food is ok they ran out of bacon on My second day so I didn‚Äôt get any nor was offered to wait for some. The Friday we stayed we had sausage the chef was nice. Staff was nice only some guests made us uncomfortable they stared at us for no good reason. It‚Äôs rude to stare at people.i think they replaced the broken mini Fridge. It‚Äôs a decent place to be honest. It‚Äôs always from Disney crowds so that‚Äôs a plus and close to the freeway. We didn‚Äôt get a Disney sign like others either but they fixed the parking error when we asked about it.
Manager Response: Dear Nayeli A.,  Thank you for taking the time to write a review based on your recent stay! I would like to extend my sincere apology for any discomfort you may have encountered in regards to our guest rooms and the amenities we offer. Our goal is to provide the most exceptional accommodations, and we are disappointed to see that we did not successfully do that for you this time around. If you are ever in the area again, we would love to have the opportunity to welcome you back for an improved visit.  Sincerely,  Susan Golden General Manager

Summary: We stayed here one night after a day at Disneyland. Check in was quick and easy, same for check out.  The front desk personnel were friendly and helpful. Our room was very clean and comfortable. The hotel is across the street from the Amtrak station but we  did not hear the trains.  The hotel had a great hot breakfast buffet.  There is a Disney shuttle stop on the corner in front of the hotel which is very convenient. We didn‚Äôt know this so we made a parking reservation and drove and parked in a Disney parking lot. I felt the price of the hotel was great compared to other hotels in the Disney area.  I would definitely stay her and recommend it

The highlight is the staff - very friendly, always helpful and smiling.  The rooms are a little dated, the bed is too soft and we found it uncomfortable. The breakfast could have healthier options, such as more fruit or yogurt.  Its an overall ok hotel, with a mini fridge that was very useful for us.
Manager Response: Dear Cybele S.,  Thank you for taking the time to write a review based on your recent stay! We are pleased to see that you were satisfied with the friendliness of our team members. I would like to extend my sincere apology for any inconvenience you may have encountered in regards to the comfort of our guest rooms and our complimentary breakfast. We strive to provide exceptional experiences and appreciate your feedback as we can use it as a tool to better improve. If you are ever in the area again, we would love to have the chance to welcome you back for a 5-star visit.  Sincerely,  Susan Golden General Manager

Summary: I stayed at the Ayers for one night as a stop on a road trip.   I got in around 7PM and was able to park in the lot and get checked-in in short order.  The room is large, quiet, with a very comfortable bed and I slept quite soundly.  The WiFi worked well.  In the morning, I used the small fitness room, which has some dumbbells, a treadmill, and a machine with pulleys -- enough to get a decent workout in.  Also, I need to do some laundry, and it so happens they have washer and dryer rooms on the 3rd and 4th floor -- both of which can be used with a credit card, which came in very handy.  I highly recommend the Ayers,

We stayed four nights at this location in February, Tues-Sat.  Hotel has easy access to multiple highways.  $10 per day parking for hotel guests.  There are not too  many eating places within walking distance, but several 1-2 miles away.  Hotel was very good overall.  Breakfast complimentary, with nice selections and limited made-to-order options.  We were going to Disneyland, and this location about 10min drive.  I would recommend.

1. Very competent, supportive and friendly staff 2. excellent location right across the street from the Honda Center 3. clean, spacious and well equipped rooms In summary : one of my two favorite hotels in the Anaheim / Orange area

The hotel is beautiful and the staff was very helpful and friendly and  I always felt safe in the area The  morning breakfast was a plus.    Definitely a great hotel if you are going to  Anaheim, the only negative is having to pay to park.

Great staff and very good location for my business trip.  Close to good restaurants. Breakfast was very good. I was surprised it was a hot breakfast not just a muffin and coffee. Easy off and on freeway.

We have stayed at the Ayers Hotel before and it is our go to Hotel when we visit LA.  The Ayers family have done an awesome job with their hotels, and you can see it by the way they take care of them.  Also, the pricing is reasonable.  The staff is always friendly and very helpful and the breakfast is good.  The rooms are very nice, spacious and quite. We definately recommend staying at an Ayers Hotel.

A few problems with getting keys to work. Magnetic strips are unreliable. It would be better to upgrade to chip technology. You have to pay for parking. The stairs in the building lead to the outside, so you have to walk around to get back in.

Stayed at this property for one night as I had an event at the Honda Center. Very nice, clean, comfortable room. Friendly staff as well. Walked across the street for the concert, walked back, had a good night's sleep, got up for breakfast at their breakfast bar and left. Convenient to the 57 freeway as well. Thanks Ayres!

We stayed for only one night. The room size is good and roomy but a little worn up. They have a good space for parking but they charge extra for it. I made a mistake by booking 2 rooms and the front end helped me gixing this issue. It is a good deal for staying in anaheim and i would recommend it.

During all my stays at this property, I have been very satisfied with the room size and how clean and comfortable the rooms are.  Front desk is always so polite, helpful and patient. When I had a problem with parking, they were very quick in resolving the issue. Lots of parking with onsite security is a plus.  Did I mention that they even have 4 Tesla chargers? That was a deal breaker for me since I own a Tesla. Breakfast was more than mediocre. Although I cannot each much eggs, there is someone there to make

Stayed 3 nights and couldn‚Äôt be more pleased.. nice rooms, hot tub and pool.. excellent continental breakfast daily cooked by friendly chefs.. ! Jonny at the front desk was very helpful.. Will definitely stay again

Beautiful hotel! Loved everything from the inside to the outside to the room. The breakfast was well worth the affordability to stay here. Great location and excellent customer service! The staff was great and the children enjoyed breakfast.

Summary Heading: Would Bring My Family Here Again
Summary: Our family thoroughly enjoyed our stay at this hotel.  The beds are comfortable, the rooms are spacious, and we felt spoiled with the extra wide tubs.  Five stars for being able to shower without touching the shower curtain.  We did have an issue with the TV in one of our rooms, and when they couldn't fix it that night, they offered to let the kids watch in another empty room for the night.  We declined but appreciated the effort.  The TV was then replaced the following day.  The breakfast is cooked to order and there was plenty of options for everyone to be happy.  When we checked in, it was busy in the lobby with various people needing help.  The front desk handled everyone gracefully.

Ayres Anaheim has excellent service, location is convenient, and facilities are good, but more than that, the staff are professional and courteous,  Good place for families as well as for business visits. Close to theme parks.

Amazing hotel, I would come back with my family again! Breakfast is really worth it many options to choose from, plus one less thing to pay for. The beds are amazing after a long day of running around! Just remember to leave your room key on the wall the whole time you are there or the power will go out in your room.

Summary Heading: OVERALL, A VERY NICE HOTEL WITH A FINE STAFF.
Summary: Overall, a good stay, enhanced in part by some of the positive interactions with hotel staff.  Exceptional service was provided by Christin and Romy. These two individuals always went above and beyond during the evening shift . Always smiling and positive. Real professionals in every sense of the word. The only concern I would mention would be the attitude of the cook who ran the breakfast room. Wasn't very friendly and the set up was a bit odd, probably due in part to coming out of the covid phase. Other than that, a very enjoyable stay. Would definitely endorse this place.

I can‚Äôt say enough about the staff at the Ayres Aneheim hotel! They were so kind and helpful! The complementary breakfast was top notch many things to choose from. Having a washer and dryer on two floors was soo helpful! I truly recommend this hotel!

This was a business  trip in that I arrived Sunday evening to a wonderful glowing fire in the warm fireplace with a beautiful Christmas tree dazzlingly decorated! Such a welcoming delight to walk through the doors and see the familiar professional front desk staff! As always the Ayres staff was beyond welcoming and they are the main reason that  I regularly return to this marvelous hotel.

It's my second time staying at a Ayres hotel on California.  Nothing but good things......good bed, quiet room....clean....easy check in and out. The complimentary breakfast in the morning was best I had on a long time.....eggs good and not watery.....made to order pancakes...and fresh made honestly potatoes on the grill also.   I will definitely be making reservations at a Ayres hotel again..!!

Summary Heading: Nice & Convient Place - watch out for auto deposit
Summary: Room was nice.  Staff was friendly.  One thing I was a bit annoyed with is the $100 deposit on my card for possible extra charges.  While I will get his back, I felt it unnecessary as I should control what goes on my card.  Might impact my decision to stay there again.  The staff was quite unsympathetic when I expressed my concerns.

Summary Heading: I've stayed here before and will be back again!
Summary: I've stayed here before and will be back again! I have been here multiple times and have never been disappointed :) great place, clean & comfortable rooms and great breakfast! I would highly recommend this hotel!!

The Ayres is the definition of attention to detail. We had a large group for work and they worked with us to make sure that all of our big changes, and small last minute changes were accommodated. The rooms are so clean and it really is like an oasis. They even had a razor and toothbrush for guests who forgot theirs. Will be coming back for sure!

Summary Heading: Very friendly staff and  extremely accommodating!
Summary: Every single worker there was so nice and treated us amazingly! If you need absolutely anything at all they will help! The bed was very comfortable as well as the pillows. The room was very clean, we had housekeeping come once in the 8 nights. We had a loud guest stay above us and the hotel manager moved them immediately after I complained about the noise. The free breakfast is so good they usually have eggs a form of hash brown or potatoes and sausage or bacon and pancakes. The kitchen staff is also very nice and friendly, the kitchen is kept very clean.  The Hotel is only 4 miles from Disneyland and it is only a 5-10 minute drive. The are is really good and we felt completely safe there. You can't beat the price and service!

Very nice room, bed was amazing and so were the pillows, the room was very quiet which was so appreciated. The tub was also clean enough for me to take a hot bath and the lobby was very cozy as was the fireplace. I took away one star because two times I smelled marijuana and I really do not like that odor at all. One instance it came right through the walls during my relaxing bath and the other was by the elevators the next day.  I also thought it was a smoke free hotel and perhaps it is, maybe the smoke free policy needs to be reviewed with guests at check in. Breakfast was also inedible but I'd expected it to be so I didn't deduct any points akthoguht the woman cooking and serving was absolutely adorable, so sweet! I don't think we were ever given the wifi code either but the

Ayres Hotel was beyond what I expected. Loved the front reception area as soon as I walked in with the fireplace lit.  Hotel Very clean; beautiful; beds were very comfortable (slept great); quiet rooms; buffet breakfast was great with fresh eggs, potatoes, bacon or sausage, and pancakes made every day by a chef and other breakfast items to choose from like cereals, bread, muffins, danish, yogurt, fruit, coffee, teas, juices.  Nice pool area and small gift shop that included wine!!  Staff is very personable and eager to please.  I did have an issue with my room when first arrived, and the Manager and staff was quick to address it and then eventually moved me to a new room.  I would highly recommend this hotel, and already have spoken highly of it to others.  If one is a hockey

Very nice experience this become my favorite place next time for south California travel, a very good location and the personal was very polite and helpful.   the parking lot is very safe and convenient, the breakfast service high recomendable

They need a serious upgrade. Everything was old. It felt more like a Motel than a hotel. There are signs at elevators that say ‚Äúone family at a time‚Äù. The rude housekeeping maid squeezed in the elevator with me and my family. So disrespectful. Will not be back. Will not recommend.

We booked a night here since we were going to a concert at the Honda Center. The location was ideal! Our room was really clean and the bed was super comfortable. Had a full breakfast in the morning that was good. We would definitely stay here again.

We really enjoyed our stay with Ayres.  Nice breakfast each day; very pleasant staff and in a time when other hotels only have every 3rd day housekeeping service (which we had been expecting) our room was maintained daily!  If we are again in OC, we will stay with Ayres Anaheim.

Awesome with an U of Ultra Awesome. Everything was beyond perfect. Ultra comfy bed, great breakfast, easy parking. We went with our two kids and it was a blast. Would come back when we return. We stayed in different hotels in California during this trip and this hotel was far beyond better than the other ones.

Everything was great.  Location close to everything in town. Hotel conditions.  Room very comfortable,  staff friendly and helpful.  Bed could have been softer.  Lobby very comfortable .  Breakfast was good,  Parking was very close and worked well.  Rooms clean.

2nd time we have stayed here. We went to a concert at the Honda center. This hotel is right across the street and super convenient. The hotel is clean and staff is friendly.  Breakfast was good. Will definitely stay again if we go to another concert or Angels game.

Great location with its proximity to the Honda Center.  Very good value for the price. The hotel also offered a free breakfast.  We found the room to be quiet and clean.  I would recommend this hotel to anyone coming in to Anaheim to see a game or concert at the Honda Center.

Fabulous free breakfast every morning. Delicious. Cooks preparing hot food to order. The beds were SO comfortable too. The staff were very friendly and accommodating   We booked 10 rooms for a 50th Class Reunion and everyone raved about this hotel. We hit a home run staying here.

Great hotel about 3 miles from Disneyland.  Very clean and amazingly comfortable beds. The hot breakfast buffet was outstanding.  Eggs, sausage or bacon, hash browns, pancakes, plus all the usual cold options.    The pool and hot tub were nice, small but very clean.  Parking was $10 a day, but most other hotels we looked at were $20 so not too bad. Staff was friendly and we enjoyed our stay.

Summary Heading: Poor response by management to disturbed person on premises
Summary: The hotel night manager allowed an obviously disturbed and drugged person to have free run of lobby and outside while ordering guests back to their rooms for "our safety".  Person was given priority over guests. We suspect he was under a homeless voucher plan of some sort. We did not pay for this sort of experience.

Stayed for one night in October 21  Good value, helpful staff, comfortable room.  Free breakfast included.  Would recommend.  We were in town for Ducks game at Honda Center.  Hotel is directly across the street.  Very convenient

Overall a nice hotel and a good experience.  Room was very clean and bed quite comfortable and the temperature was easy to regulate.  Missing tray in coffee maker prevented us from making our own coffee.  Would stay here again.

If you‚Äôre planning on working from the hotel, look no further! Not only is there an Ethernet hook up, the wifi is super fast. I had no delays in my Teams meeting! Also, there is tech support phone number that assisted me with connecting to the internet with my company‚Äôs VPN. So glad I decided on Ayres. From the internet, to the made to order breakfast, to the clean and well maintained room; Ayres did not disappoint.

Hotel is right across from angels stadium. We were going to Disneyland. They have an ART shuttle that you have to request and they come and pick you up for a small fee. However, at this time is not very reliable. Driver told us they don‚Äôt have enough drivers. Hopefully that gets resolved soon. The requesting of the shuttle has a learning curve for sure!  We had a room on the street side and my husband and I are heavy sleepers, but if you‚Äôre not like us, it might be too loud at night.   The room had a sink, fridge and microwave. Also had a coffee table and couch.   The AC was old school but it worked fine.   The TV is ooooold school but if you‚Äôre are here just to sleep, it‚Äôs good enough.   In summary, i think the hotel was a good value for the price.

This has never happened to me, and I travel A LOT. I just booked two rooms at the Ayres, directly through the hotel, and chose their 20% off rate for $156/night for staying more than 2 nights. We are staying 5 nights with two rooms. Throughout the entire transaction, the price reflected on the screen reflected the rate I chose. Then, after my CC was processed, the final screen and the corresponding email confirmation, the rate reflected was a DIFFERENT, higher rate, than the one I was booking, it no longer included the 20% off discount.  This wasn't a situation where I waited to book and then lost the good deal. The deal was prominently displayed throughout every step of my transaction, which took less than 4 minutes to complete, and then changed after my transaction.. I've

From the moment you enter and are greeted by the inviting and kind staff to the moment you check out, Ayres hotel makes you know you chose the right place to stay. The breakfast is made fresh to order everyday and is included in your stay- no hidden up charges or vouchers to buy. The rooms are clean and the beds are comfortable. We did not have time to use the heated pool or visit the gym but both looked well maintained.   The best feature overall, however, is the price! King family suite for 3 nights with parking included was $600!!!! The only downside- no shuttle to Disneyland only the ART bus. That said, with the money you save, UBER or drive your car and park- it is completely worth it to stay here!

I had a lovely experience at this hotel. The staff was very kind, the location was great (directly down the road from Disneyland), and the room was clean and comfortable. The breakfast was pretty good and the woman who was cooking it (fresh cooked breakfast!) was very kind.

My wife and I spent the weekend here just to get away from the craziness of life. We arrived Friday afternoon and check in was fast and easy.
