We strive to provide exceptional experiences for our valued guests and hope to welcome you back soon!  Sincerely,  Allen Boganwright General Manager

Summary Heading: Great hotel directly across form the Honda center
Summary: Great location with a superb staff.. Comfortable rooms. Great breakfast in the morning. I hadn't stayed there for years. we will be back. The cookies are great and the service is super. Easy 3 minute walk the the Pond
Manager Response: Dear Bradco2014,  Thank you for your thoughtful review! We are pleased to see that you found both our location and our team members to be stellar. We look forward to welcoming you back for another exceptional stay the next time you're in the area!  Sincerely,  Allen Boganwright General Manager

Summary: We always stay at this hotel when we visit Anaheim from San Diego to watch Anaheim Ducks or Angels games. It's a lovely property, and so conveniently located within walking distance of both venues as well as the train station. They always treat us right.

Bed was not the most comfy but the room was spacious and clean.  Nice...would stay again! Enjoyed the free breakfast and the view of the canal outside the window.  The room was just what we needed for the conference we attended!
Manager Response: Dear Lilliana F,  Thank you for taking the time to write a thoughtful review! We are pleased to see that you found our guestrooms spacious and enjoyed our complimentary breakfast. Your feedback regarding our beds is appreciated and we hope to welcome you back for another great stay soon!  Sincerely,  Allen Boganwright General Manager

Summary: Staff at this hotel is awesome from front desk to breakfast chef to engineering to general manager! We had two rooms for my family when going to Disneyland and they accommodated our request for rooms near each other which is nice. Staff remembered us and shared a cookie with my son each night and he loved it! Evening reception was great after a long day at the park to grab a cold drink. The breakfast had the typical eggs, potatoes and breakfast meat along with cereal, donuts, oatmeal, etc. There are more rooms available than what is listed on the website so call and speak with reservations directly to find the room that will work best with you. Super friendly agents that are willing to make sure you have a great stay.
Manager Response: Dear colettem2303,  Thank you for taking the time to write a thoughtful review based on your recent experience! We are pleased to see that you enjoyed your stay with us while visiting Disneyland and that you were satisfied with the service received from each of our team members. If you are ever in the area again, we would love to welcome you back for another stellar experience!  Sincerely,  Allen Boganwright General Manager

Summary: I have stayed at this hotel many times for bother personal and business related stays. The service is great!  From checking in, during your stay and checking out, the staff here really has your best interest in mind.  They are so easy to work with and friendly. The location can't be beat. It's close to everything and minutes away from Disneyland. Literally walking distance to the Honda Center and Angel Stadium. Rooms are clean! This is the most important aspect when staying at a hotel. When you stay, don't forget about the fresh baked cookies and social hour! Difficult to leave, but I know I will keep going back!
Manager Response: Dear Jondoc15,  Thank you for taking the time to write a thoughtful review based on your recent stay! We are thrilled to see that you've enjoyed staying with us for both leisure and business travel. We strive to provide exceptional experiences for our valued guests and we hope to welcome you back sometime soon!  Sincerely,  Allen Boganwright General Manager

Summary: The upmost prays to all the staff. I‚Äôm never disappointed when I stay at any Ayres Hotel. I book this location in Anaheim for friends and family. A big compliment to front desk and that fun man behind the breakfast counter. I‚Äôm so happy that I could enjoy my stay
Manager Response: Dear Trek222000,  Thank you for your stellar rating and review! We are delighted to see that each of your experiences with us has been exceptional and that you were pleased with the service received from our team members. We look forward to welcoming you back for another exceptional stay sometime soon!  Sincerely,  Allen Boganwright General Manager

Summary: Very clean room,great front desk person,I think her name was Gaby, Exelente breakfas,the chief has great attitude to answers your questions if you have one,I totally recomend this hotel  and of course definitely come back...
Manager Response: Dear Avalonislabonita1968,  Thank you for your stellar rating and review! We are delighted to see that you enjoyed our complimentary breakfast as well as the service you received from our friendly team members. We strive to provide exceptional experiences and hope to welcome you back sometime soon!  Sincerely,  Allen Boganwright General Manager

Summary: We stayed there for five nights. Rooms were clean. Breakfast was great. Staff was polite and helpful. Overall, I would go for it again. Good shuttle service at reasonable rate.  Also, onetime we boarded wrong shuttle bus back to another Ayres. The staff was so accommodating that she drove us back to our hotel. Thanks Athena for your help, my family is very thankful.

Although it‚Äôs a little far from Disneyland, it‚Äôs one of the best hotels I stayed in. Whatever question I had the staff was very nice and polite and patient. The room was nice and clean, the bathtub was a little small but I‚Äôm not a bath person.. Breakfast was minimal but very good and satisfying and the best part for us was the fact that check out time was noon!!!

Stayed here 3 nights to visit Disneyland. The hotel is in a great location to do so at only a 5 min drive, they also offer a shuttle bus. The hotel was clean and tidy, the room spacious and modern. Staff were friendly to deal with during check in and out and offer complimentary drinks and snacks during the afternoon. There is also a car park that can be used for a fee. Breakfast was a little basic but fine for what we needed. Hot food could be cooked on request.
Manager Response: Dear EleanorCB,  Thank you for your 5-star rating and review based on your recent stay with us! We are thrilled to see that you enjoyed your stay in our spacious guestrooms and found our service friendly. It is with great pleasure that we provide stellar experiences for our valued guests and we hope to welcome you back soon!  Sincerely,  Allen Boganwright General Manager

Summary: This hotel was clean and the staff was friendly and helpful. Their laundry room was clean and their machines worked great. The breakfast was very good. The rooms were clean and the beds were very comfortable. They had a shuttle to Disneyland that passed every 40 minutes. The parking lot was clean and if you have an electric vehicle they have charging there. We will be staying at the Ayres hotel when we visit Anaheim again.
Manager Response: Dear Dtravel6,  Thank you for your thoughtful rating and review! We are pleased to see that you enjoyed our complimentary breakfast and found our beds comfortable. We look forward to welcoming you back the next time you're in the area!  Sincerely,  Allen Boganwright General Manager

Summary Heading: Lovely boutique hotel ideal for Disneyland
Summary: This truly is a wonderful hotel only 10 minutes drive from Disney. The staff are exceptionally friendly, especially the breakfast cook. Breakfasts were plentiful and delicious and we used to fill up on them before a long day in the parks. Rooms are clean and spacious too and very reasonably priced. Parking is $10 a day in the hotel carpark. The only reason I didn't give this hotel five stars is because when we were given our keycard, we had to go back three times to the reception desk because it did not work. Apart from that, my family and I had a fantastic stay and I would definitely recommend this hotel to anyone.
Manager Response: Dear mermaid88,  Thank you for your thoughtful rating and review! We are thrilled to see that you enjoyed our complimentary breakfast and found our guestrooms comfortable. I would like to extend my sincere apology for any inconvenience you experienced in regards to the key card to your room throughout your stay. We strive to provide exceptional experiences and hope to welcome you back the next time you're in the area!  Sincerely,  Allen Boganwright General Manager

Summary Heading: THE Place to stay for Angels Game
Summary: This small hotel was such a lovely surprise on our Cali trip.  Staff is friendly, atmosphere was much nicer than price would suggest.  It was a quiet hotel and only 10min walk to the ballpark!!!   They had cookies in afternoon and nice breakfast included.    I wish there were Ayres Hotels in every city - I would definitely stay here again.
Manager Response: Dear bballeyaz,  Thank you for taking the time to rate and review your recent experience with us. We are pleased to see that you found our hotel to be a stellar option when attending baseball games at Angel Stadium and that you had an overall exceptional stay. We hope to welcome you back the next time you're in town!  Sincerely,  Allen Boganwright General Manager

Summary: Staff is very cool and breakfast was one of the best I have had.  I have to include the beds, very comfortable.    I think the 200 character requirement for Trip Advisor sucks!  It was a great stay, not going to write a book about it!
Manager Response: Dear cdanby,  Thank you for your kind review based on your recent stay with us! We are thrilled to know that you enjoyed our complimentary breakfast and that you had an overall comfortable experience. If you are ever in the area again, we would love to have the opportunity to welcome you back!  Sincerely,  Allen Boganwright General Manager

Summary: The staff at this property are truly amazing!! I had forgotten my business card holder in the room, Leslie at the front desk was more than willing to help me out and sent it to me. That's REAL customer service! I hope to come back to this property soon!
Manager Response: Dear Adolfo A,  Thank you for taking the time to rate and review your recent stay! We are pleased to see that you had an exceptional experience at our hotel during your recent business trip and that Leslie was able to assist you in getting your cardholder sent back to you. We would love to welcome you back sometime soon!  Sincerely,  Allen Boganwright General Manager

Summary: I cannot find anything to complain about.  Our stay was perfect.  We're a pretty laid back group even with 3 kids. The most important thing was feeling safe and comfortable.  When your hundreds of miles from home, that's important.
Manager Response: Dear emmasmom35,  Thank you for your kind review and rating! We are pleased to see that you had a perfect family vacation. We strive to provide exceptional experiences and are pleased you felt safe and comfortable staying with us. We hope to welcome you back to Ayres Hotel Anaheim sometime soon!  Sincerely,  Allen Boganwright General Manager

Summary Heading: Best hotel for business and pleasure
Summary: The hotel is locating in an excellent area, close to Disneyland, Honda Center, LA Angels stadium and more.  The hotel rooms are beautiful, very clean; it provide freshly cooked breakfast every morning and the Happy Hours in the late afternoon to help you to chill.  The staffs and management are so friendly and wonderful to work with, I highly recommend this hotel for business and/or pleasure trips.  Lana Walther

Hotel very well located (near to Disney, Honda Center and Angels stadium) with a very friendly atmosphere.  Concierge explained everything and they were very helpfull in general doubts about the city. Room and bathroom clean with a good deal based on the rates charged.   Breakfast was nice, with a very good service from the team. I recommend the stay on this hotel.
Manager Response: Dear vitormelo,  Thank you for your kind review based on your recent stay! We are pleased to see that you found our hotel to be in a great location and that you were satisfied with our friendly atmosphere. It would be a pleasure to welcome you back the next time you're in the area. We hope to welcome you back soon!  Sincerely,  Allen Boganwright General Manager

Summary Heading: Best Hotel for Sports Teams and their families
Summary: We had the best time staying here.  The hotel is very safe and clean. It is walking distance to Angel‚Äôs stadium and has a shuttle to Disneyland. We got to see the Angel‚Äôs and Disney fireworks right from our hotel window.   The hotel staff was amazing. We had free hot breakfast every morning which fueled the team for their games. One morning, we had a to be at the pool deck at 6, so we had to leave by 5:30am. The hotel made us breakfast bags for the whole team. They were truly amazingly accommodating to our every need.  I would definitely recommend this hotel for families wanting to stay in a safe neighborhood.
Manager Response: Dear pattisilva,  Thank you for your stellar rating and review based on your recent stay! We are thrilled to see that you found our hotel to be the perfect place for your team and that you each had an overall exceptional experience. It was a pleasure to be able to provide the team with breakfast bags on that early morning as we strive to ensure each of our guests are well taken care of. If you are ever in the area again, we would love to welcome you all back for another stellar experience!  Sincerely,  Allen Boganwright General Manager

Summary: My family stayed at this hotel for four nights, while we were in town for our child‚Äôs travel sporting event. Prior to checking into the hotel, I contacted the front desk, in efforts to modify my reservation. Even though the hotel was sold out, the front desk staff was exceedingly accommodating, and made every effort possible to meet our family‚Äôs needs.  Throughout our stay, our plans were dictated by the sporting schedule of our child. 11 other families from our team stayed at the same hotel, and were also dealing with the same scheduling issues. It‚Äôs reasonable to expect good service for one family, but it‚Äôs exceptional when all 12 families have outstanding service.  Two staff members went over and above to accommodate the needs of our group. Gabi and Alfredo left such a
Manager Response: Dear Kristinehawk78,  Thank you for taking the time to write a thoughtful review based on your recent stay! We are thrilled that we were able to assist with all of the other families needs and that each of you had an exceptional stay. We are proud to have outstanding team members as a part of our team, especially Gabi and Alfredo. I will absolutely share your insight with them. We look forward to welcoming you all back for another great stay sometime soon!  Sincerely,  Allen Boganwright General Manager

Summary Heading: Great room, bathroom vent, good breakfast.
Summary: This hotel is right across the street from the Honda Center and near enough to walk from the transport hub. Not a lot of food within walking distance, but the hotel is great. Even though no waffles for breakfast, the chef will always make you great pancakes. Looks like they alternate bacon and sausage days, and btw, the only edible turkey sausage I've had. Room and wifi are good (VPN'ed in to my job, no drops) and quiet. The bathroom actually has a vent. The pool wasn't on the huge side, but the hot tub was adequately hot. NOT wild about paying $10 a day to park - just add it to the room price. The only real negative for us was one day the maid made up the room but we'd left the Do Not Disturb sign out. Nothing missing, but everything had been moved, so it was a little
Manager Response: Dear htwh,  Thank you for taking the time to write a thoughtful review based on your recent stay with us! We are delighted to see that you enjoyed the selection at our complimentary breakfast and had an overall great stay in our spacious guestrooms. I would like to extend my sincere apology for any inconvenience you experienced in regards to your room being serviced during your stay. We strive to provide exceptional experiences and are disappointed that the do not disturb sign was missed. If you are ever in the area again, we would love to welcome you back!  Sincerely,  Allen Boganwright General Manager

Summary Heading: Excellent choice for a Disneyland trip and will return again.
Summary: This is our second time staying at Ayres Hotel Anaheim. [Note there are a couple of Ayres in the area and some reviews below look like they're actually reviewing the wrong location, so to clarify we definitely were at the ANAHEIM location.] We were greeted with a goodie bag and got a generous late check-out of 2pm for the Expedia +VIP benefits. It's close to the parks while being away from the noise and chaos of the hotels that are right by the entrance. We used a the ART shuttle or Uber for transport depending on the day. All the staff are exceptionally friendly and helpful, plus a super cosy atmosphere - lit fireplace and Christmas tree in the lobby at this time of year. Overall cleanliness and comfort were very good, but we did take points off cleanliness due to finding some
Manager Response: Dear epatri3,  Thank you for taking the time to write a thoughtful review based on your stay with us! We are thrilled to see that you enjoyed the coziness of our hotel, our optimal location, and that you had an overall comfortable stay. Your feedback regarding our breakfast offerings is appreciated as we are always open to hearing of ways in which we can improve for our valued guests. It is with great pleasure that we provide exceptional experiences and we look forward to welcoming you back the next time you're in the area!  Sincerely,  Allen Boganwright General Manager

Summary: This was our second stay at this Ayers hotel. Once for a concert and this time for an early medical appointment. We are very pleased with this hotel and will be using it for our O/C destination visits. Rooms were quiet, comfortable and pleasant. Staff was friendly and saw to our needs. Breakfast was fantastic.
Manager Response: Dear Mark F,  Thank you for your thoughtful review based on your recent experience at our hotel! We are pleased to see that we were able to welcome you back for a second time and that you found our guestrooms to be comfortable. Additionally, we are thrilled that you loved our complimentary breakfast and look forward to welcoming you back the next time you're in town!  Sincerely,  Allen Boganwright General Manager

Summary: We‚Äôve stayed here for 4 nights and enjoyed it. The Hotel located in an area has an easy access to Anaheim Convention Center. The room rate is reasonable. (in comparison to others hotels in the convention center area).Room is decent, clean and comfortable.
Manager Response: Dear Chuang004,  Thank you for your kind rating and review! We are thrilled you found our hotel to be in a convenient location and that you had an overall comfortable stay. If you ever visit the area again, it would be a pleasure to welcome you back.  Sincerely,  Allen Boganwright General Manager

Summary: Rooms are great, staff is excellent and breakfast is delicious. Well worth the extra distance to Disneyland. The art bus stops right outside the front door. We've stayed at several Ayres properties around Disneyland and they are all excellent. This was the first time we stayed at Ayres Hotel Anaheim and they did not disappoint.
Manager Response: Dear spamcow_moo,  Thank you for taking the time to write a kind review based on your recent stay with us. We are thrilled to see that you had an overall great first experience at our hotel and that you enjoyed our complimentary breakfast. We hope to welcome you back the next time you're in the area!  Sincerely,  Allen Boganwright General Manager

Summary: Clean comfortable and management that responds, even at night! Breakfast cook very courteous and was the employee that stood out!  Manager called me back after I called front desk asking to speak to manager, cleaning staff leaving t-stat on 60 degrees...
Manager Response: Dear almarc5651,  Thank you for your kind review! We are pleased to know that you found our guestrooms to be comfortable and that you enjoyed the service you received from our chef. We strive to provide the best experiences for our valued guests and we hope to welcome you back soon!  Sincerely,  Allen Boganwright General Manager

Summary: This was our second visit to this hotel and will come back fo sure.Very clean room, comfy bed, great breakfast, by the way please say hello to Jose, very friendly guy, he will make your pancakes and serve youy eggs and hashbrowns.
Manager Response: Dear thepickyfellow,  Thank you for taking the time to rate your recent experience at Ayres Hotel Anaheim! We are pleased to see that we were able to welcome you back for a second time and that you had yet another exceptional stay. We look forward to welcoming you back the next time you're in town!  Sincerely,  Allen Boganwright General Manager

Summary: We enjoyed our stay, the staff was great and everything inside the hotel was clean. Everything worked fine we were close to Disneyland there was a shuttle bus that takes you there. Area was calm and we didn't have any issues our 3 days there.
Manager Response: Dear Azucena R,  Thank you for your 5-star rating and review based on your recent experience with us! We are pleased to see that you had an overall exceptional stay and found our hotel to be in a great location while visiting Disneyland. We hope to welcome you back the next time you're in the area!  Sincerely,  Allen Boganwright General Manager

Summary: I found a welcoming, professional staff and surprisingly comfortable beds. Breakfast was good and location is great for Disney Land. Parking was secure and cheap. Shuttles to and from the park were convenient.
Manager Response: Dear DagKristiansen,  Thank you for your thoughtful review based on your recent experience with us! We are delighted that you enjoyed your stay in our comfortable guestrooms and that you found our hotel to be in a stellar location for when visiting Disneyland. It would be a pleasure to welcome you back the next time you're in the area!  Sincerely,  Allen Boganwright General Manager

Summary: This was our third time staying here for the Angel‚Äôs series against Oakland. The hotel is perfectly located within walking distance of Angel‚Äôs stadium and Honda Center is right across the street. The rooms are comfortable and the beds are good. Breakfast is included (full breakfast including bacon and eggs) and the cooks are friendly and accommodating. I‚Äôll be back.
Manager Response: Dear lindawI9112RU,  Thank you for your thoughtful review based on your recent stay! We are thrilled to see that you have returned to stay with us and you found our guestrooms to be comfortable. We look forward to welcoming you back the next time you're in town!  Sincerely,  Allen Boganwright General Manager

Summary: We stayed at the Ayres Anaheim after a visit to Disneyland.  It was a reasonably convenient drive from the park.  We called ahead with some questions, and the staff was very friendly and helpful.  Check-in was great, and the rooms were HUGE, comfortable, and clean.  There was a full breakfast in a large, bright room.  On top of everything else, it was a great rate.  A+ experience.
Manager Response: Dear pabramowich,  Thank you for taking the time to write a review based on your recent stay with us! We are pleased to see that you found our hotel to be in a stellar location and that you had an overall comfortable stay. We strive to provide exceptional experiences for our valued guests and we are glad to see that we were able to successfully do so from the start of booking your reservation to check-out. We hope to welcome you back for another 5-star experience sometime soon!  Sincerely,  Allen Boganwright General Manager

Summary Heading: Very friendly staff and great hotel
Summary: We highly recommend Ayres Hotel Anaheim....We have stayed at this hotel a few time with our young family. Everyone who works here is extremely friendly and always inviting. The hotel is clean and rooms are very spacious for a family to stay in. We love that the ART transporation comes right to the hotel and takes us to Disneyland main gates. After a long day at Disney, it was pleasant to return to the hotel with the staff welcoming you back and a plate of delicious cookies at the front desk. We love the great breakfast options in the morning, which our kids loved. It is a great hotel and you will not regret booking a room with them for your stay.
Manager Response: Dear Sawytravlers4,  Thank you for taking the time to write a thoughtful review based on your recent stay! We are delighted to see that you have returned to stay with us in our spacious guestrooms and that you had an exceptional experience each time. We strive to provide our valued guests with the best experiences and are happy you enjoyed our complimentary breakfast as well. We look forward to welcoming you back the next time you're in town!  Sincerely,  Allen Boganwright General Manager

Summary: we wanted a hotel that was convienient , clean, and comfortable- bingo!!!!!. Ayres of Anaheim did all that and gave us a very nice breakfast thrown in. we were right across the street from Honda Stadium.
Manager Response: Dear beemerman,  Thank you for your kind review! We are pleased to see that you found our hotel to be in a convenient location while visiting the Honda Center and that you had an overall comfortable stay with us. We hope to welcome you back the next time you're in the area!  Sincerely,  Allen Boganwright General Manager

Summary: We stayed at Ayres because we were attending a concert at Honda center. The hotel is literally an easy 3 minute walk to the venue with crosswalks and direct access. There‚Äôs a fun brewery next door to the hotel so we went there before and after the concert which was super convenient. The room itself was very large, clean and the bed was very comfortable. Even though we faced the freeway it was quiet and we slept great. Breakfast was fine- standard fare but included in the rate. Very happy we stayed here.
Manager Response: Dear JudiE2960,  Thank you for taking the time to write such a thoughtful review based on your recent stay with us. We are thrilled to see that you found our guestrooms to be spacious and that you had an overall comfortable experience. If you are ever attending another event at the Honda Center, we would love to welcome you back!  Sincerely,  Allen Boganwright General Manager

Summary Heading: Perfect Hotel for Honda Center events
Summary: This is the place to stay when attending a concert or event at the Honda Center. You have a guaranteed, convenient parking space and room right across the street from the Honda Center. Check in, take a rest, get some dinner and then walk with the happy crowd of concert-goers literally across the street to your event, and walk back the same way: totally safe and secure area immediately adjacent to the venue. Hotel staff are incredibly helpful and professional. We will definitely stay here again when attending any Honda Center event.
Manager Response: Dear John D,  Thank you for your kind rating and review! We thrilled to see that we are your chosen hotel while attending events at the Honda Center and that you found our team members to be helpful. Thank you again for your thoughtful review and we look forward to welcoming you back sometime soon!  Sincerely,  Allen Boganwright General Manager

Summary: My family and I came here two years ago and had the most pleasant experience! They‚Äôre hotel is very clean, beds are comfy, wonderful accommodations to and from the Disney parks, and the hotel staff is delightfully friendly!! After a second long day at the parks, we came back and asked where we could go for a quick bite to eat. Justin recommended JT Schmidt‚Äôs across the street. What an awesome recommendation it was!! Food was great and just what we were looking for. We also got a 10% discount thanks to Justin advising us to let the waitress know we were staying at Ayers. When we were leaving the hotel to go to JT‚Äôs, my mother had put the room card in the wrong ticket box and it got stuck and the machine ate the card! I went into the lobby and told Alfredo. He chuckled and came

Summary Heading: Celebrating my aunt's 100th birthday in CA.
Summary: We didn't know much about this part of Caifornia but we had a great reason to visit. It turned out that your hotel was close to so many things; restaurants, baseball stadium, Honda Center and best of all, the train stations.  Many thanks for the hospitality.  It was a great hotel in which to stay.  Loved the breakfasts, the happy hour, the fresh baked cookies, the front desk and kitchen staff, and the cleanliness of the rooms, dining area, and pool.  Would definitely recommend your hotel to our friends.

The staff at the hotel helped in every way possible.  Marie couldn't do enough for us.  She offered rides, got our luggage to our room, brought us treats, and checked to see if we needed anything else,  Jose is a true gem.  He is an excellent cook. He manages the food  service and individually serves the needs of the patrons.  Good Job.

We stayed at the Ayers Hotel in Anaheim for 3 nights. We stayed to be close to Disney for our reservations to the new Star Wars land. It was a lovely stay. The rooms were spacious, clean, and well appointed. The only problem with the hotel we had during our stay was with the first night when the cookies during ‚Äúsocial hour‚Äù were gone with over 20 minutes left in the social hour.   We enjoyed the pool and the hot breakfast. The morning chef during our stay was pleasant and made my kids Mickey shaped pancakes.  We would not recommend staying here when the Angels are at home if you are not a baseball fan as the parking lot is difficult to exit and get into before the game begins.
Manager Response: Dear bartschir,  Thank you for your kind review based on your recent stay with us. We are glad you found our guestrooms to be spacious and that your children enjoyed the Mickey Mouse shaped pancakes at our complimentary breakfast! Your feedback regarding our evening happy hour is appreciated as we strive to provide the best experiences for our valued guests. If you are ever looking to visit Disneyland again, we would love to be able to welcome you back for another great stay!  Sincerely,  Allen Boganwright General Manager

Summary: We spent 10 nights at Ayres Anaheim. Great location right next to Anaheim Stadium, and with the shuttle bus stop for Disneyland right in front of the hotel it was super convenient to get over to Disney and back each night.  Walked to two Angels vs Mariners games.  Clean, comfortable room. Friendly staff at check in, at breakfast, at all times. The breakfast was good each morning.  Pancakes made to order. Eggs, hash browns, bacon or sausage, fresh fruit and yoghurt, three cereals and an assortment of bagels, donuts and danishes etc.
Manager Response: Dear JediNeo,  Thank you for taking the time to rate and review your recent stay with us! We are delighted to see that you found our hotel to be in a great location and that you enjoyed our complimentary breakfast. We hope to welcome you back for another great stay the next time you're in the area!  Sincerely,  Allen Boganwright General Manager

Summary: The hotel was chosen by those who coordinated a meeting I attended for a few days. I'd been to Costa Mesa many times, but I'd not ever stayed here. The lobby, courtyard, pool area, and restaurant are beautiful. The room was very quiet with a view of the pool area. Those at the front desk were very kind and helpful.

Clean and comfortable rooms, easy check in and out, pleasant people.  Fresh cookies, cocktail hour, free breakfast!  I usually stay for business but see vacationers alll the time so must work well for both. Thank you for a pleasant stay.
Manager Response: Dear WorKKing,  Thank you for taking the time to rate and review your experiences with us! We are delighted to see that you enjoyed our complimentary breakfast, fresh baked cookies and cocktail hour. It is a pleasure to provide comfortable accommodations for our valued guests and we look forward to welcoming you again!  Sincerely,  Allen Boganwright General Manager

Summary: We would definitely stay here again, although nothing was outstanding. Area was very convenient and safe. Traffic was not bad. Parking was plentiful (nightly charge of $10) even though it also appears open to the public ($40?). Front desk staff were all quite friendly, especially when we had numerous questions since there was no binder of info in the room to inform us of breakfast hours, pool hours, area attractions, nearby restaurants (JT Schmid's is next door and quite good), Disney shuttle ($5/person), area churches, etc. There was one day that the roads near the hotel were blocked in certain directions due to an event at the Honda Center, so that was interesting.   Continental breakfast was good, but I wish there were signs telling us the daily choices. The poor woman doing
Manager Response: Dear Luve2Travel35,  Thank you for taking the time to write a thoughtful review based on your recent experience with us! We are pleased to see that you had an overall great stay and that you found our hotel to be in a convenient location. Your feedback regarding our complimentary breakfast, evening happy hour, and signage throughout our hotel is appreciated as we are always open to hearing of ways we can improve for our valued guests. If you are ever in the area again, we would love to have the opportunity to welcome you back!  Sincerely,  Allen Boganwright General Manager

Summary: I enjoyed staying at the Ayres Hotel. It is clean, near Disneyland, and affordable. I recommend to anyone in the area. The free hot breakfast is delicious and very fresh. It includes pancakes, sausage, eggs, and potatoes along with other cold food items.

We recently stayed at the Ayres Hotel for two nights.  Our room was comfortable, clean, and well-equipped.  The hotel is located between the Honda Center and Angel Stadium.  If you stay at this hotel you can walk to games at either venue.  The staff was extremely friendly and helpful, and gave us several helpful recommendations during our stay.  The complimentary breakfast is excellent.
Manager Response: Dear Bill K,  Thank you for your kind review! We are pleased to know that you had a comfortable stay with us and that you enjoyed our complimentary breakfast. It is with great pleasure that we provide our valued guests with exceptional experiences and we hope to welcome you back the next time you're in town!  Sincerely,  Allen Boganwright General Manager

Summary: Ayres Hotel is located across the street from Honda Center. It is a very comfortable and quiet hotel.with a wonderful and helpful staff. We stayed there for a hockey game at Honda. There is a restaurant just across the street too. This hotel attracts a more sophisticated clientele than others in Anaheim catering to revelers going to Disneyland. Staying there was a joy.
Manager Response: Dear palmjumper,  Thank you for your kind rating and review! We are pleased to see that you had a comfortable stay with us and that you found our hotel to be in a convenient location. It is with great pleasure that we provide exceptional experiences for our valued guests and hope to welcome you back sometime soon!  Sincerely,  Allen Boganwright General Manager

Summary: We had originally stayed in a different hotel and checked out early due to it being loud at the hotel and staff not carrying. Just happened to find Ayres Hotel as we drove to the Angels stadium.  Best choice in hotel hands down! Ayres smelled wonderful as you walked in and the staff all around were great.  Jason at the Front Desk was extremely helpful at check in and later on that evening when our neighbor upstairs was walking heavy, Jason went above and beyond to make sure we had a good night sleep and room changed us to where there would be no one above us.  The beds and pillows were very comfortable and the room was very clean and spacious. Location of the Ayres is also great as it is right off the freeway and close to everything. Also liked the closed off parking, $10 for
Manager Response: Dear Crystal Y,  Thank you for taking the time to write a thoughtful review based on your recent stay! We are pleased to see that you found our hotel to be the perfect fit for your needs and that you had an overall exceptional experience. We strive to provide our valued guests with the best stays and are happy we were able to successfully do that for you. Thank you for choosing us as your new go-to hotel while visiting the area, we look forward to seeing you again!  Sincerely,  Allen Boganwright General Manager

Summary Heading: Awesome service and friendly staff! Highly recommended!!!
Summary: Had a very good experience. Staffs were super friendly and polite. Best of all, we ordered a lot of online orders prior our check-in date. On the day we arrive at the hotel, the staffs kindly advised us that they have receive the packages for us and assisted in putting them on the luggage cart. We really appreciated for the superb service at no extra cost too!  Special thanks to Sylvia from the reception.  We will definitely return to this hotel in the near future. Highly recommended!!
Manager Response: Dear majidaddy,  Thank you for your kind review! We are happy that you had an overall exceptional stay with us and that we were able to assist you with your packages. If you are ever in the area again, we would love to welcome you back!  Sincerely,  Allen Boganwright General Manager

Summary: My colleague and I stayed for 5 nights, attending the RE Congress in Anaheim. Loved our rooms, spacious and very comfortable but would have enjoyed a jug to boil water - microwave just doesn't cut it for us. Desk staff and kitchen staff were very warm, welcoming and helpful. Thought the  'Happy Hour' was a great idea Monday - Thursday and we managed to attend one of them. Enjoyed the breakfasts each morning too, loved our host and his sense of humour!  Definitely recommend.
Manager Response: Dear 5Teresa,  Thank you for your thoughtful review! We are happy to see that you found our guestrooms to be spacious and enjoyed our complimentary breakfast. Your feedback regarding the amenities provided in our guest rooms is appreciated as we strive to provide exceptional experiences for each of our valued guests. We hope to welcome you back sometime soon!  Sincerely,  Allen Boganwright General Manager

Summary Heading: Perfect place to stay for an event at Honda Center
Summary: I just stayed at the Ayres Hotel Anaheim with two other friends when we attended the Pink concert at Honda Center.  It could not have been any easier.  It is an easy walk right across the street and also there are plenty of restaurants around to grab a bite to eat prior to the event.  Catching an Uber or Lyft was super quick and easy.  The staff was very friendly and helpful with any questions that we had.  We just stayed the one night and then took advantage of the great breakfast buffet that is included. It was just what we needed for the night.  Friendly staff, clean & spacious rooms, easy to get around the area.  I would absolutely stay here again.
Manager Response: Dear evdc_ca,  Thank you for your thoughtful review based on your recent stay! We are pleased to see that you found our hotel to be in a stellar location when attending events at the Honda Center and that you had an overall exceptional stay. It is with great pleasure that we provide the best experiences for our valued guests and we hope to welcome you back the next time you're in town!  Sincerely,  Allen Boganwright General manager

Summary: The best part of this hotel is it's location across the street from the Honda Center.   The staff is very helpful and the hotel is clean.   It was an advantage to us to have a refrigerator and microwave in the room.   On the downside, the rooms are a bit dated and we could hear some hallway noise.    The breakfast room was under renovation when we were at the hotel in February.  Perhaps the complimentary breakfast is better in the actual breakfast room, however, we found the breakfast to be very poor quality.   I was appalled at the use of so much plastic and only styrofoam cups for coffee.  Tons of waste of plastic, e.g. plastic sets of silverware wrapped in plastic so if you wanted just a fork, you threw away quite a bit of other plastic.
Manager Response: Dear LibbyAH,  Thank you for your thoughtful review! We are pleased to see that you found our hotel to be in a stellar location and that you were pleased with the amenities provided in our guestrooms. I would like to extend my most sincere apologies for any inconvenience you experienced in regards to the surrounding noise, as well as our complimentary breakfast. Your feedback regarding the materials used during our breakfast hours is appreciated as we are open to learning ways we can improve for our valued guests. If you are ever in the area again, we would love to welcome you back!  Sincerely,  Allen Boganwright General Manager

Summary Heading: Do yourself a favor and book elsewhere
Summary: I will say that I usually book with Ayres Orange & have enjoyed our visits there. I thought this would be the same, but I was wrong. The hotel itself is okay, average, but other places are nicer for around the same price point. WiFi is TERRIBLE, doesn‚Äôt work at all. I called the desk & they said ‚Äúusually it‚Äôs your phone if the WiFi doesn‚Äôt work, good luck‚Äù.   We booked this hotel for Disneyland. I was going for my birthday & was excited because they offer a ‚Äúshuttle‚Äù. this is INCORRECT information. they do in fact have a shuttle, but it just sits in their parking lot & is not used for their guests. Instead, they offer a ART pass (that the guest pays for!) which is public transportation. it was CONSISTENTLY LATE by 40 minutes to an hour! Do you know how valuable those minutes are
Manager Response: Dear brittanymmiller,  Thank you for taking the time to write a review based on your recent stay with us. I would like to extend my most sincere apology for any inconvenience you experienced in regards to our WiFi and the Anaheim Resort Transit shuttle service. We understand your frustration with the delays of the shuttle, however, it is a public service provided by the city of Anaheim and we cannot control their timing unfortunately. We certainly wished you had a better experience with us as we strive to provide exceptional stays for our valued guests and are saddened to know that this impacted your stay in a negative way. Your feedback is appreciated in regards to the service provided by our team members and we will absolutely use it as a tool to better improve for the future. Thank you again and we hope to be able to welcome you back for a stellar experience sometime in the future.  Sincerely,  Allen Boganwright General Manager

Summary: The staff are friendly, the hot breakfast is a nice treat, the rooms are clean, updated, comfortable and large and the shuttle to Disneyland was usually only about 10-15 min ride...much better than the long walk from some of the slightly closer hotels. It‚Äôs truly a great place to stay.
Manager Response: Dear Debra M,  Thank you for your kind review based on your recent stay! We are happy you enjoyed our complimentary breakfast and that you had an overall comfortable stay. If you are ever in the area again, we would love to welcome you back!  Sincerely,  Allen Boganwright General Manager

Summary: Great service. The staff was very courteous and friendly. Our room was very clean. It Exceeded our expectations. Within walking distance to restaurants. Great breakfast. Had a very inviting lobby. Will definitely come back.
Manager Response: Dear Consuelo M,  Thank you for your thoughtful review! We are glad you found our hotel to be in a great location and that you had an overall exceptional stay. If you are ever in the area again, we would love to welcome you back!  Sincerely,  Allen Boganwright General Manager

Summary Heading: We stay at this hotel very often. It is beautiful hotel with very nice staffs.
Summary: Room are very nice,and clean always we stay in this hotel.  However, I have to mention two things about this hote that management make this hotel %100 perfect.  1-  This hotel serves breakfast and every time and100s of people are served in about 3 hours every day.  The cook is very nice man and he by himself cook and serves all these people.  I see him every time that he is out of his breat and stressed and needs somebody help him out.  Yesterday I saw him he checked coffee maker and other machines and took care of them also.  It was amazing.  Please provide him more assistant.  2- This  hotel is beautiful with especial style.  It is very clean and beautifully organized.  However, there is some odor, may be moisture of dirty sheets and towels after cleaning the rooms and staying

We stayed at the Ayers Anaheim for the Big West Basketball tournament which is held across the street at the Honda Center. Their van driver was unavailable so the GM, Allen, drove us to our car rental agency. Great guy! Amanda, at the front desk, was also very helpful and pleasant. We enjoyed talking with other basketball fans at the complimentary breakfasts....and the food was good. We plan to stay at the Ayers again next year.
Manager Response: Dear cathyky,  Thank you for your kind rating and review! We are thrilled to know that you had an exceptional stay with us and enjoyed our complimentary breakfast. It was a pleasure to assist you in getting to the car rental agency as it is a priority to make sure our guests are well taken care of during their stay. We look forward to welcoming you back!  Sincerely,  Allen Boganwright General Manager

Summary Heading: Reasonable price, nice accomadations, and a Very pleasent and helpful staff
Summary: This is the 3rd or 4th time we have stayed at this hotel in the past 4 or 5 years and it has always been a reasonably priced  pleasant stay aided by a very pleasant and helpful staff which is attentive to families with children. In addition, it is conveniently located near 3 great venues: Anaheim Disney Land; Los Angles Angels baseball stadium; and the Honda Center with Ducks Hockey and Major shows like Elton John. Also, it is only a short walk from a transportation hub that includes some train service.
Manager Response: Dear kenneths577,  Thank you for your thoughtful review! We are pleased to see that you have returned to stay with us over the years and that each experience with us has been exceptional. It is with great pleasure that we provide great experiences for our valued guests and we look forward to welcoming you again!  Sincerely,  Allen Boganwright General Manager

Summary: This is a great place to stay if your staying at Disneyland. I think the great reviews are based on service and breakfast. The people that we encountered that work here were all super nice. Especially the chef that cooks the breakfast. He was def good peoples! They had delicious fresh backed cookies for us when we arrived. Sweets win me over lol. The rooms are ok. Nothing special. Don't expect them to look as good as the do in the pictures. They don't. They do have a slight lower end feel. But why the 4 stars. Like i said the service and the breakfast were great. Best included breakfast I've ever had besides 5 star places and their not free. So if your looking for a place to stay at Disneyland than this is a great option.
Manager Response: Dear mamalolo02,  Thank you for your thoughtful review based on your recent stay! We are pleased to see that you enjoyed our complimentary breakfast and the stellar service you received from our wonderful team members. Your feedback regarding our guestrooms is appreciated as we strive to provide the best experiences for our valued guests. If you are ever in the area again, we would love to welcome you back!  Sincerely,  Allen Boganwright General Manager

Summary: In Anaheim I stayed at the Ayres hotel near the train station. It was also walking distance to see a concert at the Honda Center. There is also a shuttle bus to get to amusement parks in the area. The hotel was clean, comfortable and conveniently located to where I needed to go.
Manager Response: Dear Jennifer B,  Thank you for your kind review! We are glad you had a comfortable stay with us and that you found our hotel to be in a convenient location. If you are ever in the area again, we would love to welcome you back!  Sincerely,  Allen Boganwright General Manager

Summary: We stayed here in February.  The Honda Centre is directly across the street. Very convenient to attend any events at the Honda Centre.  This is considered a Boutique style Hotel.  It is well maintained.  Breakfast is included in the stay.  The breakfast room was under renovation when we stayed.  The temporary location was fine but one of the sitting rooms was quite chilly.  We were experiencing record temperature lows at the time.  The elevators were reasonably quick and efficient.  The room was quite comfortable and clean.  We didn‚Äôt use the pools as they are outside in a courtyard.  The parking is outside and more reasonable than the posted signs which are there to discourage folks who are attending events, to park.  There are several eateries within a 10 minute walk or a

The rooms are very nice and comfortable. My room was quiet even though it overlooked the street. A coffee-maker is included, along with a small

Summary: I booked the Ayers Hotel as the hotel block for my wedding weekend in Anaheim. From the start, customer service was great. My contact was Deanna and she was very helpful throughout the process. During our stay, all staff we encountered were accommodating and friendly as well.  The location was great - near the freeway, and also close to Disneyland (about 2 miles/10 mins) but not *too* close. As for the room rates, very reasonable. Our friends and family mentioned how nice their room was for the price. The complimentary breakfast was also tasty - fresh pancakes to order in addition to the usual staples of scrambled eggs, sausage, potatoes, fruit, pastries, yogurt, and oatmeal. I would definitely recommend for travelers. My only "negative" note: from our room I could hear music

Summary Heading: There for a game at the Honda Center
Summary: If you're going to attend a game,concert etc... at the Honda Center this is the hotel for you!  There's a restaurant right across the street and the Honda Center is just across the street as well.  It's very close to the Train Station and it's an affordable option if you're going to Disneyland too.  Breakfast is included and it's great!  They do an excellent job, I highly recommend this Hotel.

If you want to attend an event at the Honda Center and can take Amtrak or Metrolink to Anaheim, you won't need a car as it is walkable to/from the hotel and arena. Hotel has all the conveniences you would want...daily hot breakfast included, M-Th happy hour offered beer, wine, chips/dip also included, small fitness room, and outdoor pool with jacuzzi. Great staff all around from reception to housekeeping.  Only cons for some people (did not bother me) may be: no in-house restaurant although there is a reasonable restaurant across the street that serves good food, not in a

Summary Heading: Great Location for Honda Center Events
Summary: The Ayres Anaheim is literally across the street from the Honda Center. The hotel is a little on the older side, but it's kept spotlessly clean. My King Bed Suite was spacious and well equipped, including a small sink, coffee-maker, fridge, and microwave. The staff is professional and quite  friendly. On the downside, the water pressure in both the bathroom sink and the shower is quite poor. Wifi was less than adequate--I constantly lost the signal on my iPhone, though I didn't have this issue with my iPad.  One of the best features of this hotel is the excellent breakfast. In spite of the styrofoam plates and bowls, and plastic cutlery, the food is fresh and well prepared. The star breakfast item is the delicious pancakes.   There is absolutely nothing other than a mediocre

I booked this hotel because it is walking distance to the train station.  My son and I were visiting for an event at angel stadium which was also walking distance. At first I was going to book another hotel that was farther and cheaper but then I would have had other expenses to get to the stadium. It all evened out but was able to stay at a nicer hotel. Being close and able to walk made it SO much easier and less of a headache.   The staff was friendly and very helpful with any questions I had, we felt very welcomed.  The room was great! It was clean and comfortable and I really liked that they conserve the best way they can. We also enjoyed the complimentary breakfast which was so much more then just a banana and wrapped sticky looking muffins.  I‚Äôm excited for future events

Thank you for your great serve. It is became good business trip ,thank to you. And I was so happy there are self serve some kind of wine & beer ,also juices in night. There are some restaurant within 15 min on foot range of this hotel.

They also have a shuttle but could not take advantage of this because I was informed they had no driver. The noise from guest running upstairs was annoying. The construction noise was also a bother especially since I was not told anything about it at checkin. The biggest thing was that I noticed little bugs crawling in the bathroom and for my 3 night stay I was constantly itching in the room. I dont know what kind of bugs they are but it was torture. Didnt

The hotel is very clean, two twin beds which were very comfortable and a small kitchenette which had a fridge,microwave and sink. There‚Äôs a small shop at reception to buy drinks and crisps etc. The breakfast was good, not a great selection but you could easily find something.  The only down side to this hotel is the size of their swimming pool. We didn‚Äôt even bother going in as my kids were so dissapointed.    The staff were very friendly and helpful, i would dedicatedly stay at this hotel again.

We stayed in a 2 Queen Bed room. Beds were super comfortable and very clean. Pillows were excellent. Breakfast is OK - just enough to get you loaded with some calories. Location is perfect for Disneyland which is about a 5 minute drive. Excellent rates if you pre-pay room. Would not hesitate to stay again. Probably the best place in Anaheim that does not leave a big hole in your wallet/purse.

The gym was smallish but we still got a good workout I, the pool was shallow but the hot tub was a nice time. If you don't plan on working out while on a family trip to the city or Disneyland, come to the Ayers hotel!

Summary Heading: Excellent hotel and service - great location
Summary: This was an excellent find. The hotel is clean and the staff very attentive (Anthony at the front desk) Nice warm breakfast served my cheerful crew (Maricella and Bonita). We left a phone charger and they were great getting it mailed to us. Will stay again.

This property is conveniently located by Disneyland. My wife and I have stayed here our past three trips. The rooms are very clean and the breskfast is freshly prepared every morning. They also serve delicious chocolate chip cookies at the front desk. I always miss out on them, but Leslie Gozalez was nice enough to save me some in my own box. She went above and beyond to make my day as a guest. I would highly recommend this property to anyone.

Summary Heading: Hardly what I'd call a boutique hotel but pleasant nonetheless
Summary: I stayed two nights at the Ayres Hotel in Anaheim while at a professional conference. The hotel is situated right next to the ARTIC station, which made it easy to travel by train rather than drive to Anaheim. The staff were extremely pleasant and helpful, and the room was quite comfortable. It was raining very hard when I arrived, so I appreciated the fireplace in the lobby. The hotel includes a hot breakfast, which was appreciated, although the breakfast space is quite crowded and not very appealing to spend any time in. There is public transportation via bus #15, though I opted instead to use Lyft (fares to the Convention Center averaged about $8.50 plus tip). Overall, I liked the hotel but disagree with the characterization of it as a "boutique" hotel, which leads me to have

Summary: We stayed here for 3 nights and first impressions; were great and had a wonderful atmosphere. Absolutely loved the fireplace and the Christmas decorations. Staff were great, rooms were great and exceeded expectations with how big they were. Beds were very comfortable!. We had a complimentary breakfast every morning which was really nice. Overall I would rate this place 9/10. It‚Äôs only missing 1 point because we didn‚Äôt like the washing machines to much and how you had to pay $3 to use both the washing machine and then the dryer as well. For our next visit to America we would be more than happy to stay at the Ayres hotel.

A nice sitting area downstairs with a fireplace was a place for our nightly family gatherings.  Restaurant next door for dinner.  Convenient location off the 57.  Pricing was very affordable.

Summary: This hotel is perfectly located if you need to get to the stadiums. Be warned - there are lots of families as one might expect so close to all the attractions. Rooms are clean, parking easy, staff VERY polite and quick to respond if you have any needs. Bonus - has some yummy spots to eat right around the corner... Blind Rabbit. Calivino Wine Pub. Ranch Restaurant.

We stayed here the week after Thanksgiving.  It worked out well.  The hotel is quite nice, furnished in a rich modern theme, conveniently located to nearby attractions and restaurants.  Staff very helpful and professional.  On-site self parking, hosted evening gathering in the beautiful lobby and daily breakfast compliment the offerings Ayers provides.  Shuttle to Disneyland is available for a fee or included with some packages. Book directly for the best rates / call for detailed information.

Booked their Holiday Magic Seasonal Disneyland Special package for 4 nights which includes free parking each day (parking is only $10 per night if not booking with a package), breakfast, late check-out, and up to 4 free 3 day shuttle passes to Disneyland. The shuttle picks you up in front on the hotel every 40 minutes, and its a convenient 15 to 20 minute ride to the park. This beats driving to the park and paying the $20 per day to park at Disneyland. Rooms are updated and our 2 queen beds were comfortable with plenty of space for a family of four. Stayed on the 4th floor and the room was quiet and we were able to sleep at night with no noise. Breakfast was excellent and had a good variety. There were eggs, bacon or sausage, cooked to order pancakes, which were very good. You

My family and I stayed in Ayres Hotel Anaheim during the busy Thanksgiving and Black Friday holidays.  The marketing spiel was generally spot on.  - convenient location - check - boutique European inspired hotel - check - fireplace by the lobby - check - early evening snacks - check - clean big rooms - check  What made the stay extra memorable for me was Jose, the F&B Manager, who appears to singlehandedly prepare fresh some of the tastiest scrambled eggs, bacon, sausage and pancakes you can eat for breakfast.  More than that however, he is still able to pause for a few seconds to chat and ask about your upcoming day.  This really made a difference and made this hotel stand out from the 4 that we‚Äôve stayed in during this family vacation.   I would really recommend this hotel.

Summary Heading: Breakfast, Social Hour, and a Shuttle Service
Summary: I booked this hotel based on the amazing reviews past guests have given regarding the rooms, breakfast, and shuttle service to Disneyland and this hotel went above and beyond my expectations. When we checked in, the hotel was clean and smelled like thanksgiving. The room was big and great for the price with amenities such as a microwave and a mini-fridge. The breakfast was amazing and varied from day to day and the chef was pleasant and happy to help. The shuttle service was cheap and ran from 6:30 AM till 12:30 PM so going back and forth from Disneyland to the hotel for a break was easy and quick. Finally, the hotel had a social hour with free cookies, alcohol, and soft drinks. I look forward to my next visit to LA and staying at this hotel.

Check in and check out were both easy as.  The hotel is kept extremely clean and has lots of additional extras- like happy hour every afternoon in the lobby. Our room was a great size and had 2 very comfortable beds. House keeping always did a great job!  Breakfast is simple but great and tasty. We caught a local ART bus to DL everyday from right outside the hotel door. You can purchase passes at the front desk at a very reasonable price. Buses are not run by the

Summary: It was close off to the freeway. They contacted before my arrival to see if I needed anything else and they were very accommodating. A plus breakfast, noon check-out and close to locations. Spacious room and great front service.

Summary Heading: Great location, clean and great staff
Summary: Stayed here before : great hotel. Clean, great location, friendly staff. Breakfast is cooked fresh , lots of choices. Benita and Inez ( breakfast staff) worked both days at breakfast. Despite lots of guests, they kept the breakfast coming hot and tasty. Breakfast supplies constantly refreshed and tables cleared. At the end of the scheduled time after what seemed a busy morning... they accommodated a late arrival with a hot plate and a smile ! Great staff. We will be back !

Summary Heading: Best location EVER for an event at Honda Center
Summary: We found our new favorite hotel while visiting Aneheim! Wonderful friendly staff who upgraded us the day of our concert after I called right before we headed there. Our room was ready early, and it was pleasantly very big, comfortable and exactly what we needed. We went for a concert at Honda Center and it was a 2 minute walk‚ù§Ô∏èWe will be back!! Thank you for a perfect night

First time we stayed here. The Ayres hotel is a very nice hotel. Although we got a room right next to a busy road, it didn‚Äôt really bother us. The staff is very friendly and helpfull, breakfast is good. It‚Äôs a bit of a drive if you‚Äôd like to go to Disneyland though. Plenty of parking space. I definitly recomment this hotel.

Summary Heading: A Nice Place To Stay When Visiting Anaheim
Summary: On a recent trip to Anaheim; we stayed at the Ayres Hotel and found it to be an enjoyable option.  Prior to check in we started to get texts offering us all sorts of things from early check in to a bottle of wine but of course; each of those came with an additional fee.  After an afternoon of errands and some coverage at Knott‚Äôs Berry Farm; we settled into the hotel and were able to find parking close to the door and experienced a very pleasant and fast check in. Our room was clean and comfy but we were not able to get the Air Conditioning to come on. The room requires a room key to be in a slot to get power as if you remove the key; the lights and power go off until the key is returned. Despite this we had no A.C. and a helpful staff member came in to reset the breaker on the

Summary Heading: From start to finish, a wonderful stay
Summary: We loved our stay! Every staff member we met was friendly and so kind and genuinely interested in our comfort. Our room was perfect and clean, and breakfast exceeded my expectations. This will be our place to stay on our next visit!

It was a great night but the room smelled a lot of tobacco. Everything else was perfect. Front desk personnel were very kind and friendly, rooms were clean and the hotel is well located. Happy to return sometime.
Manager Response: Dear Ilia S,  Thank you for so much for your candid review. We truly appreciate your compliments regarding our attentive team members and clean accommodations. Your insight is greatly appreciated and we hope to welcome you back soon!  Sincerely,  Allen Boganwright General Manager

Summary Heading: Favorite place to stay when going to Disney!
Summary: Location is great! - very easy to access from freeway, near the Anaheim Stadium. A nice breakfast is included in the price as well as the parking. They have a pool and a small hot tub where we spent a couple of hours after a long day out. They also have a small gym available for guests.   Rooms are spacious, very clean and with lots of amenities to the entire family. We took a family room with 3 beds (2 twin and one king size) two bedrooms, two TVs, etc which was great for our family.   Staff was helpful and very friendly!   We love this hotel and we are definitely staying here next time we are in the area or going to Disney (as we have been doing in the last years) :)
Manager Response: Dear Mario G,  Thank you for so much for your wonderful review. I am pleased to see that you enjoyed your recent stay at Ayres Hotel Anaheim. Thank you kindly for your compliments regarding our optimal location, our premium amenities, and our attentive team members. Your insight is greatly appreciated and we look forward to your return!  Sincerely,  Allen Boganwright General Manager

Summary: My review on this place is above average hotel. The rooms are clean, the staff is friendly, never showed any negativity. The breakfast was great, its pancakes, eggs, sausage, yogurt fruit, cereals, donuts. Wonderful breakfast which is wonderful to be included with the room. Didn't mind the drive to Disneyland cause we always park our car there. I was very happy they had two computers that I can use for schoolwork while my wife was using the laptop in the room using their wifi which is somewhat above average.
Manager Response: Dear Kerri-Ann R,  Thank you for so much for your wonderful review. I am pleased to see that you enjoyed your recent stay at Ayres Hotel Anaheim. Thank you kindly for your compliments regarding our attentive team members, clean accommodations, and the premium amenities we offer. Your insight is greatly appreciated and we hope to welcome you back soon!  Sincerely,  Allen Boganwright General Manager

Summary: The hotel is very easily accessible, off of major freeways and immediately across from Anaheim Stadium and convention center.  Nice breakfast, friendly and very helpful staff. Only downside was a $10 per night parking fee added to our booking. Otherwise a good experience.
Manager Response: Dear jimwhelchel,  Thank you for so much for your wonderful review. I am pleased to see that you enjoyed your recent stay at Ayres Hotel Anaheim. Thank you kindly for your compliments regarding our optimal location, attentive team members, and the premium amenities we offer. Your feedback is greatly appreciated and we hope to welcome you back soon!  Sincerely,  Allen Boganwright General Manager

Summary: We stayed at the Ayres for our 2 days at Disney. The staff were extremely helpful and made us feel right at home. The location is right off the highway and walking distance to the baseball field. We took a shuttle to and from Disney that picked us up at the hotel. A great breakfast was included and they have a vending machine right beside the front desk. Which you can also charge to your room. Our king size bed was so comfortable that we actually slept in. Definitely stay here again next time we're in the area.
Manager Response: Dear Kerri-Ann R,  Thank you for so much for your wonderful review. I am pleased to see that you enjoyed your recent stay at Ayres Hotel Anaheim. Thank you kindly for your compliments regarding our attentive team members, optimal location, and the premium amenities we offer. Your insight is greatly appreciated. We hope to welcome you back soon!  Sincerely,  Allen Boganwright General Manager

Summary: If you‚Äôre visiting Disneyland or any of the surrounding areas in Anaheim, I would highly recommend staying at the Ayres Hotel.  Concierge was so helpful and made our check-in quick and easy.  The day before check-in I received a text asking if I had any special requests, and I really just wanted to make sure our room wasn‚Äôt on the 1st fl.  And just like that, a confirmation text was received the day of letting me know a room was ready for me on one of the higher level floors.  The room was a lot bigger than what I had expected and very clean.  Bed was super comfy.  Sheets smelled freshly washed.  We had everything we needed.  Breakfast was tasty and check-out was just as quick and easy as it was to check-in.  More importantly, the staff was super friendly and professional.  I
Manager Response: Dear jadesa675,  Thank you for taking the time to write a review informing others of your recent stay at Ayres Hotel Anaheim. I am thrilled to read about your stay and how much you enjoyed staying with us. Your compliments regarding our attentive team members, comfortable accommodations, and premium amenities are greatly appreciated. Thank you again for your candid feedback, we look forward to welcoming you back.  Sincerely,  Allen Boganwright General Manager

Summary: Very comfortable stay, friendly staff, always smiling. Great room, with comfortable beds, great laundry. Free happy hour is provided every afternoon and also freshly baked cookies every afternoon, which were lovely especially when you come back from a big day out. The kitchen staff were very friendly and nothing was ever a problem.
Manager Response: Dear Kathy W,  Thank you kindly for your candid feedback. I am delighted to know that you enjoyed your stay at Ayres Hotel Anaheim. We strive to provide a comfortable and exceptional guest experience and I am pleased to see that that we were able to do just that during your stay. Thank you so much for your feedback and the kind compliments you have shared. We hope to welcome you back in the future.  Sincerely,  Allen Boganwright General Manager

Summary: Celebrated my 40th high school reunion 9/29.  Excellent accommodations, I booked a two room suite and it was perfect.  Really miss a bell hop though and room service.  Breakfast buffet was awesome and really good.  I will be coming back!
Manager Response: Dear Norma I,  Thank you for choosing Ayres Hotel Anaheim. I am thrilled to read about your experience and how much you enjoyed your stay. Thank you for your compliments regarding our comfortable accommodations and the premium amenities we offer. Your insight is truly valuable to us and I thank you for taking the time to share your feedback. I hope to welcome you back in the future.  Sincerely,  Allen Boganwright General Manager

Summary Heading: Comfortable, Convenient, and all around a great place.
Summary: When I arrived to the Ayers, we were greeted by Andrew Day.  He welcomed us with a smiling face and did everything he could to make sure we were happy.  I am a member a gold level reward member of another service but because of that I was given a welcome bag with water and some yummy snacks.  I have stayed in this hotel before because of the location.  I went to a concert at the Honda center.  It is so amazing to walk across the street to eat and then just stroll across the street to the Honda Center.  No traffic, no parking issues and when the show is over, it's just a short walk back.    The hotel is very clean, has comfortable beds, room had nice furniture and a big screen tv.  What else do you need?  Andrew, than you for your smiling face and Ayers Hotel, keep doing a great
Manager Response: Deat Mellyca,  Thank you for the great review. I am pleased to see that you enjoyed your stay at Ayres Hotel Anaheim as well as the attentive service we strive to provide each of our guests. Thank you for your compliments regarding our optimal location and our well-appointed  accommodations. Thank you so much for your feedback, we look forward to your next visit.  Sincerely,  Allen Boganwright General Manager

Summary: My daughter and I stayed here for her sixteenth birthday trip to see a concert at The Honda Center. This hotel is literally across the street from the venue, a five minute walk at most. The hotel offers secure gated parking for only $10 per night.  Check in was quick and the staff very friendly. I received a text message the day before we arrived asking for my preferences and any special requests I might have. Everything was ready for us. There is a small snack shop just to the side of the check in desk that offers drinks, snacks and toiletries. This was really convenient. Our room was spacious and comfortable. This was one of the cleanest hotel rooms I have ever stayed in.  The beds were very comfortable and we slept great.  The AC worked perfectly. In the morning we enjoyed a
Manager Response: Dear Paula R,  Thank you kindly for your candid review. I am thrilled that you and your daughter enjoyed your stay at Ayres Hotel Anaheim. Thank you for your compliments regarding our optimal location, attentive team members, and comfortable accommodations. Your feedback is greatly appreciated as well as your recommendations of our hotel. I hope you choose to stay with us again in the near future!  Sincerely,  Allen Boganwright General Manager

Summary: the hotel and room was clean and bed was very comfortable the staff was friendly informative - the rates were fair for the location - I would definitely recommend this hotel to family and friends - was in walking distance to restaurants and entertainment venues
Manager Response: Dear Camper200632,  Thank you so much for taking the time to review our hotel. I am thrilled to know that you enjoyed your stay at Ayres Hotel Anaheim as well as the attentive service we strive to provide. Thank you for the compliments you have shared and for recommending our hotel. We hope to welcome you back soon.  Sincerely,  Allen Boganwright General Manager

Summary Heading: Amazing for events at the Honda Center!
Summary: The hotel and room was updated updated and clean. The staff was friendly and informative. But most importantly, it's in a perfect location for our concert that was at the Honda Center (which is catty-corner to the hotel). Overnight parking was a reasonable $10 for hotel guests and the room came with vouchers for their hot breakfast,  which was decent.  Super convenient location and overall, lovely hotel stay.
Manager Response: Dear Sarah H,  Thank you so much for your candid review. I am pleased to see that you enjoyed your stay at Ayres Hotel Anaheim, as well as the attentive service we strive to provide our valued guests. Thank you for your compliments regarding our accommodations, optimal location, and our helpful team members. Your feedback is greatly appreciated and I look forward to welcoming you back soon.  Sincerely,  Allen Boganwright General Manager

Summary: Finally!! A hotel that is clean, friendly and has a great view! The bed was so comfortable and everything was accessible! I love this hotel!!! The bathroom was spacious and everything was set up perfectly !!!
Manager Response: Dear Brennda D,  Thank you so much for reviewing our hotel. I am thrilled to read about your experience and how much you enjoyed your stay at Ayres Hotel Anaheim. Thank you for your compliments regarding our comfortable accommodations and attentive team members. We hope to welcome you back soon!  Sincerely,  Allen Boganwright General Manager

Summary: The best hotel I have ever stayed at. The friendliest staff!!. The cleanest!!! The most updated!! The rates are a fare well best price!!  If I could I would never stay anywhere else wish there were more places like this. WORDS WILL NOT DO THIS PLACE JUSTIS A 10 STAR PLACE!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!! üíñüíñüíñüíñüíñüíñüíñ

Very good accommodation. Clean and spacious rooms. The staff were genuinely friendly and interested in us, from the front desk to the chef , Jose, who cooked the included breakfast. Very convenient location. The hospitality hour was a nice touch. We will definitely stay at this chain of hotels in the future if their other hotels are up to the standard of this one.

Summary Heading: A must stay when in Anaheim
Summary: This place was one of the best places we have stayed due to the whole package offered. Very friendly and accomodating staff, very clean and comfortable rooms along with great breakfast and social hour. Right across the road feom the Honda center (for the hockey) 5 min walk to Angel stadium or shuttle to downtown Disney. When in the states again we wouldn't hesitate staying in this Hotel. Keep up the great work!

I enjoyed staying at the Ayres. The beds and pillows are amazingly comfortable! The room and bathroom was nice, air conditioning in my room worked great. The front desk workers are SO NICE and accommodating. I was by myself so they really helped me figure out where things were and just talked to me like a friend which was great! They also have a little store which is perfect if you dont feel like ubering or driving to Walgreens etc. They have all kinds of snacks, drinks, ice cream freezer, but also have important toiletries etc like Mouthwash, Pepto/Tylenol/ other medicines, Toothbrush, Condoms, hairspray etc !! They also have some cute hats and bags for those who want a last minute Souvenir! Also it's right by the Angel's stadium & the Hockey stadium is literally right across

Summary Heading: Family gathering for Honda Center event
Summary: This hotel is a real gem! So happy I took a chance on this place! I was apprehensive about booking because I'd never heard of it before and because it didn't offer any big extras. But we needed to be close to the Honda Center so I went for it. My family thoroughly enjoyed their stay. Anaheim staff was super accommodating and rooms were clean, comfortable and quiet. The pool and gym were small but quite nicely kept. The breakfast buffet was also great. Nice restaurant next door which offered discount with show of room key. I became a member & ready to check out other locations

The location is great, close to Honda Centre, Angels Stadium, Transportation Hub and Disney (Area Rapid Transport  bus can be booked). We found all the staff friendly and helpful. . The social hour was great!!! Lovely wine, soft drinks, chips, salsa, etc. Would highly recommend  this hotel, it's the best we have staped in in this area.

On our first visit to the States, we chose to stay at the Ayres Hotel in Anaheim, we were pleasantly surprised with the space of our rooms, cleanliness & everything we needed. During the week of our stay my husband got very sick & a Doctor had to be called, he was able to diagnose the problem & after they had picked me up from the floor with the cost of a 10mintute service, my husband was just dehydrated. The staff were fabulous they rushed out to purchase cordial etc. for him with no charge to us. Only problem is that unless you have your own transport, it will be a bus/taxi ride to a decent restaurant, very few places to eat within walking distance of the Ayres Hotel Other than that I have only praise for this lovely inexpensive Hotel.
Manager Response: Dear Marjorie W,  Thank you so much for your candid review. I am pleased to see that you enjoyed your first visit to the states and to Ayres Hotel Anaheim!
